Title: Blue Cheese Coleslaw

Title: Cajun Meat Loaf
Ingredients: ["2 whole Bay leaves (optional)", "1 Tbsp. salt", "1 tsp. ground red pepper", "1 tsp. black pepper", "1/2 tsp. ground cumin", "1/2 tsp. ground nutmeg", "2 Tbsp. butter or cooking spray", "3/4 cup chopped onions", "1/2 cup chopped celery", "1/2 cup chopped green pepper", "1/4 cup chopped green onions", "2 tsp. minced garlic", "1 Tbsp. Tabasco sauce", "1 Tbsp. Worcestershire", "1/2 cup evaporated milk (I use skim milk)", "1/2 cup catsup", "1 1/2 lbs. ground beef (or ground turkey)", "1/2 lb. ground pork", "2 eggs, beaten", "1 cup fine bread crumbs"]
Recipe: ["Melt butter over medium heat or spray pan with cooking spray. Add onions, celery, peppers, & green onions, garlic, tabasco, worcestershire and \"seasoning mix\". Saute until mixture starts excessively sticking to pan, about 6 minutes. Stir in milk and catsup. Continue cooking 2 minutes, stirring. Remove from heat and allow to cool to room temperature. Place meat in bowl. Add eggs, vegetable mixture (REMOVE THE BAY LEAVES AT THIS TIME!) and the bread crumbs. Thoroughly mix by hand. Pack meatloaf into an ungreased bread pan. Bake at 350 degrees uncovered for 25 minutes, then 400 degrees for 35 minutes. Serve plain or top with catsup before baking."]

Title: Peanut Butter Cups

Recipe: ["Combine crumbs, peanut butter, butter and sugar.", "Work together until smooth.", "Press mixture into a 9 x 9-inch pan (or longer if you want thinner bars).", "Melt chocolate chips over hot water, spread over cracker mixture.", "Refrigerate until cool, cut in squares."]

Title: Seasoned Pork Chops
Ingredients: ["pork chops", "seasoned salt"]
Recipe: ["In a large skillet on low heat cook", "pork chops slowly. When brown on one side, turn over and", "sprinkle\ton", "seasoned salt. Continue to cook slowly and turn", "often; season lightly each time you turn.", "Cook thoroughly, but do\tnot", "burn, about 30 minutes."]

Title: Butter Pecan Pie
Ingredients: ["1 c. vanilla ice cream", "2 1/4 c. milk", "2 small pkg. instant butter pecan pudding"]
Recipe: ["Mix all ingredients together and beat for 3 minutes.", "Pour into graham cracker crust and let set for 3 hours.", "Top with Cool Whip."]

Title: Green Peas And Potatoes

Recipe: ["Cook peas and celery following directions.", "Mix soup and water; stir and bring to a boil.", "Add potatoes.", "Whip with fork until smooth.", "Spoon onto a platter.", "Hollow center of potatoes to make a nest.", "Spoon peas into hollow."]

Title: Chicken Tetrazzini
Ingredients: ["3 1/2 lb. stewing chicken", "salt", "pepper", "1 lb. fine spaghetti", "1 large can mushrooms", "1/2 c. flour", "1 c. light cream", "1/2 c. sherry wine", "3/4 c. grated Italian cheese", "paprika", "1/2 c. olive oil"]
Recipe: ["Simmer chicken in 2 quarts of water, seasoned with salt and pepper, covered, for 3 hours or until fork-tender.", "Remove chicken from broth.", "Bring broth to a boil; add spaghetti and cook for about 8 minutes.", "Drain and reserve broth.", "Remove skin and bones from chicken and separate into small pieces.", "Add back to broth. Boil down to 2 cups; strain."]

Recipe: ["Mix all together, drop by teaspoons in hot oil.", "Brown both sides and drain on paper towels.", "Sprinkle with powdered sugar or granulated sugar.", "Makes 4 dozen."]

Title: Hot Cocoa Mix

Title: Dirt Cake
Ingredients: ["1 large pkg. Oreo cookies (1 1/4 lb.)", "1 (8 oz.) cream cheese", "1/2 stick margarine", "1 c. powdered sugar", "12 oz. container Cool Whip", "2 small pkg. vanilla instant pudding", "3 1/2 c. milk"]
Recipe: ["Crumble cookies to dirt consistency in food processor.", "Cream the cream cheese, margarine and powdered sugar.", "Mix pudding and milk.", "When thick, beat in cream mixture.", "Fold in Cool Whip. Layer in a 9-inch flowerpot dirt and cream mixture.", "Start and end with dirt."]

Title: Yeast Rolls
Ingredients: ["1 c. sugar", "2 sticks margarine", "1 1/2 tsp. salt", "1 c. boiling water", "2 pkg. dry yeast", "1 c. warm tap water", "2 eggs", "6 c. flour"]
Recipe: ["In large bowl, stir 1 c. sugar, 2 sticks melted margarine, 1 1/2 tsp. salt, and 1 c. boiling water.", "Stir until dissolved.", "In a small bowl, dissolve 2 pkg. dry yeast into 1 c. warm tap water. Beat 2 eggs and add to yeast mixture.", "Combine yeast and eggs with first mixture.", "Stir in 2 lb. (6 c.) flour.", "Keep in bowl and put on lid.", "Refrigerate at least four hours before using.", "Shape the rolls, dip them in flour, and then in melted margarine.", "Place in greased pan.", "Let set out 3 hours before baking and do not cover. Bake in 400 degree oven about 12 minutes."]

Title: Garden Vegetable Burrito
Ingredients: ["1 Tbsp. butter or oil", "1 small zucchini, diced", "8 mushrooms, sliced", "6 to 8 broccoli florets, sliced", "1 green bell pepper, diced", "1 or 2 jalapenos, seeded and minced", "1/2 c. corn kernels", "1 tsp. ground cumin", "1/2 to 1 c. shredded Provolone or Monterey Jack cheese", "tortillas, warmed"]
Recipe: ["In large skillet add butter, zucchini, mushrooms, broccoli, bell pepper and jalapeno.", "Saute on medium heat for 5 minutes, until vegetables are tender.", "Reduce heat; add corn and cumin. Heat for 2 to 3 minutes.", "Remove from heat and quickly blend in cheese.", "Serve with mango."]

Title: Sweet 'N Sour Chicken

Title: Chocolate-Covered Cherries
Ingredients: ["60 maraschino cherries with stems", "3 Tbsp. butter or margarine, softened", "3 Tbsp. light corn syrup", "1/4 tsp. salt", "2 c. sifted powdered sugar", "1 1/2 lb. candy-making milk chocolate, cut up"]

Title: Coconut Cake
Ingredients: ["1 Duncan Hines butter cake mix"]
Recipe: ["Mix as directed on box.", "Bake in 2 layers.", "When cool, split each layer to make 4 layers."]

Title: Indian Fry Bread
Ingredients: ["2 c. all-purpose flour", "1/4 c. Parmesan cheese", "1 tsp. salt", "1 small bottle olive oil", "water"]
Recipe: ["Heat approximately 1/2 cup olive oil in a large heavy skillet over low to medium heat.", "In a large bowl, combine 2 cups flour, 1/4 cup Parmesan cheese and 1 teaspoon salt.", "Mix.", "Add water, about 2 tablespoons at a time, while stirring until mixture is sticky.", "Scrape out on floured surface.", "Knead in small amount of flour until slightly stiff."]

Title: Ham Casserole
Ingredients: ["1/2 lb. deli ham, cubed", "1 large box macaroni, cooked", "1 c. Parmesan cheese", "2 eggs", "milk", "butter"]

Title: Chocolate Frosting

Recipe: ["Put first 3 ingredients in pan. Boil 1 minute; keep stirring. Remove from heat and add chocolate chips; keep stirring. Will thicken as it cools. Best to put warm on warm cake."]

Title: Vermont Spinach Salad
Ingredients: ["1 lb. spinach", "1 large hard-boiled egg", "1/4 lb. extra sharp Cheddar cheese, grated", "2 pinches kosher salt", "1 large, firm red apple, cored", "6 slices bacon, cooked until crisp", "1/3 c. maple syrup", "1/3 to 1/2 c. cider vinegar", "freshly ground black pepper"]
Recipe: ["Wash, dry and stem spinach and place in a serving bowl.", "Cut apple in half; cut each half into 1/2-inch chunks and add to spinach.", "Chop egg and crumble bacon and add to spinach.", "Toss until evenly distributed.", "Add cheese and toss.", "In a small saucepan, whisk together maple syrup and 1/3 cup vinegar.", "Taste and add 1 to 2 more tablespoons vinegar, if desired.", "Add salt and pepper.", "Heat until warm.", "Pour warm dressing over spinach; toss and serve immediately.", "Serves 4 to 6."]

Title: Better Than Sex Cake

Recipe: ["Mix cake according to package directions.", "Bake in 15 x 11-inch pan.", "While warm, poke holes in cake and pour Eagle Brand milk over all.", "Pour 1/2 jar of caramel ice cream topping over cake and Eagle Brand.", "Cool in refrigerator.", "Spread with large Cool Whip.", "Crumble Butterfinger candy bar over top."]

Recipe: ["Fry sausage or bacon separately.", "Melt oleo to cover skillet bottom.", "Fry okra in oleo on medium heat without cover.", "Cut up tomatoes and onion into skillet with okra.", "Let okra cook until slightly browned or done looking.", "Put in bacon bits and/or sausage; season to taste."]

Title: Killed Lettuce
Ingredients: ["lettuce", "green onions (fresh)", "1/3 c. vinegar", "salt", "little brown sugar"]
Recipe: ["Clean lettuce.", "Add onions.", "Mix together vinegar, salt and brown sugar.", "Pour over lettuce.", "Heat grease and pour over lettuce.", "Eat immediately."]

Title: Beef Stroganoff
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 to 2 lb. stew meat, cut into bite size pieces", "1/4 c. flour", "3 Tbsp. oil", "salt and pepper to taste", "1 jar sliced mushrooms, drained", "enough beef broth to cover meat", "1 small container sour cream", "rice or noodles"]
Recipe: ["In a skillet, add oil.", "Put flour, salt and pepper in a baggie.", "Add meat a little at a time.", "Shake to coat.", "Add to hot oil and brown.", "Scrape all into crock-pot.", "Add enough beef broth to cover.", "Heat on high for 1 hour.", "Turn to low; let cook 6 to 8 hours (until meat is tender).", "Fifteen minutes before serving, add mushrooms.", "Cook either rice or noodles.", "Just before serving, add sour cream."]

Title: Taco Soup
Ingredients: ["2 onions", "2 bell peppers, chopped", "1/3 stick oleo", "2 lb. ground round", "1 tsp. garlic, minced (or garlic powder)", "1 pkg. taco mix (dry)", "1 pkg. Hidden Valley Ranch dressing mix (dry)", "few dashes Tabasco sauce", "few dashes lemon pepper", "1 can Bush's pinto beans", "1 can Traple's pinto beans (with jalapenos)", "1 can stewed tomatoes", "1 can Ro-Tel tomatoes", "2 (8 oz.) cans tomato sauce", "1 can hominy, drained", "1 can whole kernel corn, drained", "1 tsp. sugar", "4 c. water"]
Recipe: ["Saute onions and bell peppers in oleo.", "Add ground round and scramble fry.", "Add garlic or use garlic powder.", "Add dry taco mix, dry Ranch dressing, Tabasco sauce and lemon pepper.", "Add remaining ingredients.", "Simmer for 1 1/2 hours.", "Let set for 4 hours.", "May serve soup over corn chips and grated Cheddar cheese."]

Title: Scampi For Two
Ingredients: ["3/4 lb. shrimp, deveined and uncooked", "1/2 stick butter", "2 cloves garlic, crushed", "2 Tbsp. lemon juice", "salt to taste", "pepper to taste", "1 to 2 tsp. minced parsley", "buttered bread crumbs (optional)"]
Recipe: ["Melt butter in skillet over medium heat. Stir in garlic (do not brown). Add shrimp and saute 1 to 2 minutes (until opaque). Take up shrimp. Bring sauce to boil quickly until thick.", "Pour over shrimp."]

Title: Lye Soap

Recipe: ["Pour 2 1/2 pints of water in granite pan or any container not aluminum.", "Pour lye in water and stir well until dissolved.", "Let stand for 1/2 day; melt grease and strain.", "Stir in lye mixture and stir until thick and looks white.", "Let set overnight.", "Cut out."]

Title: Cantaloupe Soup
Ingredients: ["1 large (about 3 lb.) cantaloupe", "4 1/2 c. unsweetened orange juice, divided", "3 Tbsp. lemon juice", "1/4 tsp. ground ginger", "1/4 tsp. ground allspice", "fresh mint leaves (optional)"]
Recipe: ["Cut cantaloupe in half and remove seeds.", "Peel each and cut fruit into 1-inch cubes.", "Combine half of cantaloupes and 1/2 cup orange juice in container of an electric blender; process until mixture is smooth.", "Repeat processing with remaining cantaloupe cubes and an additional 1/2 cup orange juice.", "Combine cantaloupe mixture, remaining 3 1/2 cups orange juice and next 3 ingredients, blending well; cover and chill thoroughly.", "Garnish with mint leaves, if desired.", "Yield:", "6 cups."]

Title: Miss Daisy'S Tea Punch

Title: Baked Spinach Parmesan Dip

Title: Zucchini And Tomato Saute

Title: Mary'S Fudge(May Be Made Weeks Ahead And Stored In Refrigerator.)

Title: Cherries In The Snow

Title: Silver Queen 1-2-3(Microwave)

Title: Lois Punch

Title: Spinach Dip

Title: Pineapple Pesto Potato Salad

Title: Pork Chop Meal
Ingredients: ["2 tsp. shortening", "4 pork chops (1/2-inch thick)", "1/2 c. chicken broth", "4 small potatoes, peeled and quartered", "4 medium carrots, peeled and cut up", "1 small onion, chopped", "2 Tbsp. all-purpose flour", "1 can cream of mushroom soup"]
Recipe: ["Heat oil in a 4-quart pressure cooker.", "Season pork chops with salt and pepper; brown on both sides in hot shortening.", "Add broth.", "Place vegetables on top of pork chops.", "Add soup over top. Close cover securely.", "Cook 10 minutes at 15 pounds of pressure. Cool quickly under cold running water.", "Remove chops and vegetables to a serving platter.", "Blend flour and 1/4 cup cold water.", "Add to juices in pan.", "Cook and stir until thick and bubbly.", "Serve with chops and vegetables."]

Title: Sunshine Salad
Ingredients: ["1 lb. grated carrots", "1 c. raisins", "2 Tbsp. mayonnaise", "5 Tbsp. orange juice", "dash of salt"]
Recipe: ["Mix together the carrots and the raisins.", "Refrigerate.", "At the last minute, stir in the dressing."]

Title: One Minute Bread And Butter Pickles
Ingredients: ["1 qt. sliced cucumbers", "few slices onion", "1 c. vinegar", "1 c. sugar", "1 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. mustard seed", "1 tsp. celery seed", "1 tsp. turmeric"]
Recipe: ["Put all ingredients, except cucumbers, in an enameled pan and let come to light boil.", "Add cucumbers.", "Let come to boil and boil 1 minute.", "Pack in sterilized jars.", "Seal while hot."]

Title: Seven Layer Salad
Ingredients: ["1/2 head lettuce, shredded", "1 pkg. frozen petite peas", "3 green onions, sliced", "8 or 9 slices bacon, chopped and fried crisp", "4 sliced, hard-boiled eggs", "2 c. mayonnaise, thinned with a little milk", "sharp Cheddar cheese, grated"]
Recipe: ["Layer in 9 x 13-inch glass pan in the order given.", "Cover with plastic wrap and age overnight in the refrigerator."]

Title: Raspberry Topping
Ingredients: ["1 c. raspberries", "1 c. sugar (granulated)", "1 egg white"]
Recipe: ["Beat, beat, beat and beat some more!"]

Title: Hotel Adler Black Forest Gateau
Ingredients: ["3 layers of Chocolate sponge cake", "7 oz. can Black cherries", "4 1/2 oz. Red currant jelly", "3 c. Whipped cream", "3 Tbsp. Cherry brandy", "1 3/4 oz. Dark chocolate, shaved"]
Recipe: ["Spread red currant jelly evenly over 1 layer of chocolate cake, then spread about 3/4 cup whipped cream over the jelly and add the cherries. Place another cake on the top of the cherries and drizzle cherry brandy over it, spread with 3/4 cup cream. Place the third cake on the top. Spread the remaining cream over the top and sides, sprinkle with shaved chocolate and decorate with whole black cherries."]

Title: Blueberry Muffins

Recipe: ["Mix flour, sugar, baking powder and margarine until well blended.", "Set aside 1 cup for streusel topping.", "Add 2 eggs and 1 cup milk; beat until smooth.", "Add 2 cups blueberries and spoon into paper-lined muffin cups."]

Title: Bean Salad
Ingredients: ["1 can green beans", "1 can yellow beans", "1 can kidney beans", "1 can lima beans", "1 c. vinegar", "1/2 onion", "2 c. sugar", "1/2 c. water", "1 tsp. celery seed"]
Recipe: ["Bring to a boil and pour over beans."]

Title: Spaghetti Saucewith Or Without Meat
Ingredients: ["3 1 lb. cans of crushed tomatoes", "1 6oz. can of tomato paste", "1 1/2 tsp. onion powder", "1 Tbsp. garlic powder", "3 Tbsp. oil", "1 c. water", "1 Tbsp. sugar", "1 1/2 tsp. salt", "1 1/2 tsp. oregano", "1/2 tsp. black pepper", "1 large bay leaf", "Optional:", "1-2 lbs. Italian sausage", "and/or 1-2 lbs. beef brisket"]
Recipe: ["Add all ingredients together in large pot.", "Stir well to mix paste.", "If using meat, slice sausage into six inch lengths.", "Beef brisket can stay whole or for quicker cooking cut into 2 inch wide strips the length of the brisket.", "Bring to boil stirring often, then simmer over low heat for 2-3 hours.", "Longer cooking adds more flavor and makes meat more tender.", "May be frozen and reheated for future meals.", "Makes 1-2 meals depending on family size.", "Serve over pasta."]

Title: Beef Stroganoff

Title: Tomato Celery Soup

Recipe: ["Saute onion and celery in butter; do not brown.", "Add tomato soup, water, parsley, lemon juice, sugar, salt and pepper.", "Simmer 5 minutes.", "Celery will remain crisp.", "Top with unsweetened whipped cream and chopped parsley, if desired."]

Title: Mom'S Date Cookies
Ingredients: ["2 c. flour", "2 tsp. baking powder", "1/3 tsp. salt", "1 c. dates, sliced", "1/2 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 c. shortening", "2/3 c. sugar", "1 egg", "2 to 4 Tbsp. milk"]
Recipe: ["Sift dry ingredients.", "Cream shortening.", "Stir in sugar gradually.", "Add unbeaten egg and sliced dates.", "Mix well.", "Add milk and vanilla.", "Stir in dry ingredients."]

Title: Cucumber-Yogurt Salad
Ingredients: ["4 cucumbers", "1 1/2 tsp. salt", "2 (8 oz.) cartons plain yogurt", "2 Tbsp. lemon juice", "1 clove garlic, minced", "1 tsp. dried whole dill weed", "2 tsp. chopped fresh mint or 1/2 tsp. mint flakes"]
Recipe: ["Peel cucumbers and quarter lengthwise; cut crosswise into thin slices. Spread cucumber slices in a large shallow dish. Sprinkle with salt; let stand 16 minutes.", "Drain well.", "Combine remaining ingredients, except mint; add cucumber slices and mix well.", "Sprinkle with mint. Yield: 8 servings."]

Title: Percolator Punch

Title: Frozen Punch Cubes

Recipe: ["Simmer the sugar and water for 5 minutes. Add the orange juice and unsweetened pineapple juice.", "Mix well and pour in ice cube trays.", "Freeze well.", "Just before serving, fill glass with about 3 cubes and pour chilled ginger ale over them."]

Title: Shrimp Spread

Title: Strawberry Sherbet

Recipe: ["Mix all ingredients together thoroughly.", "Pour into a large container and freeze thoroughly.", "Defrost 20 minutes before serving."]

Title: Strawberry Salad

Title: Chili Con Carne

Title: Pasta With Beans And Garlic

Title: Green Beans In Tomato Sauce

Title: Crispy Cookie Coffee Cakes

Title: Cole Slaw

Title: Bean Salsa Soup

Title: Corn Chowder

Title: White Bread

Title: German Potato Salad

Ingredients: ["4 sq. semi-sweet chocolate", "2 Tbsp. milk", "1 Tbsp. margarine", "2 bananas, sliced", "2 3/4 c. cold milk", "2 (3.40 oz.) pkg. vanilla instant pudding", "1 1/2 c. whipped topping", "graham cracker crust"]

Title: Hamburger Soup
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 lb. ground beef", "2 c. tomatoes", "2 c. mixed vegetables", "1 c. green beans, frozen", "2 c. or more liquid", "1 large onion, diced", "4 stalks celery, sliced", "2 c. shredded cabbage", "1/2 c. spaghetti (rice)"]
Recipe: ["Cook beef and onion together until onions are tender and drain off fat.", "Add rest of ingredients.", "Simmer slowly 30 minutes or more.", "Add more seasonings if needed.", "Makes a big pot of soup. This is good leftover or it may be frozen."]

Title: Sugar Cured Ham
Ingredients: ["ham or shoulder (from a hog, about 200 lb.)", "1 Tbsp. red pepper", "2 Tbsp. black pepper", "3 Tbsp. brown sugar", "1 1/3 c. salt"]

Title: Cranberry-Orange Relish
Ingredients: ["1 lb. (4 c.) fresh cranberries, washed", "1 to 1 1/2 oranges", "2 c. sugar"]
Recipe: ["Put cranberries through a meat grinder.", "Pare orange; remove seeds.", "Trim off any white membrane.", "Put orange rind and pulp through meat grinder.", "Mix sugar, berries and orange together. Chill a few hours (3 to 4) before serving."]

Title: Pickled Shrimp
Ingredients: ["6 celery stalk tops", "3 1/2 tsp. salt", "1/4 c. mixed pickling spices", "water", "2 1/2 lb. shrimp", "onions", "7 to 8 bay leaves"]
Recipe: ["Combine first 3 ingredients.", "Add water (enough to cover the shrimp).", "Add shrimp.", "Cook 10 to 12 minutes.", "It is done when the shrimp turns pink.", "Drain and cool with water.", "Peel and clean shrimp.", "In glass pan (9 x 13-inch), alternate shrimp with layers of onions.", "Add bay leaves with sauce."]

Title: Apple Cole Slaw

Title: Overnight Lettuce Salad

Recipe: ["Mix together and spread carefully on top of lettuce.", "Top with bacon bits (either Bac*Os or crumble fried bacon).", "Cover tightly and refrigerate overnight.", "This salad keeps well into the second or third day."]

Title: Boiled Custard

Recipe: ["Heat milk until it's too hot to stick your finger into (do not let it boil).", "Beat eggs and sugar together until foamy.", "Pour quickly into hot milk, stirring constantly until mixture thickens and will coat a spoon about 20 to 25 minutes.", "Remove from heat and add vanilla.", "Cool and refrigerate.", "The custard will get thicker as it cooks."]

Title: Smoky Cheese Ball

Title: Lime And Horseradish Salad

Title: Freezer Slaw

Title: Apple-Cinnamon Muffins
Ingredients: ["1 egg", "2 c. Bisquick baking mix", "1 tsp. ground cinnamon", "1/3 c. sugar", "2/3 c. milk", "2 Tbsp. vegetable oil", "3/4 c. chopped apple"]
Recipe: ["Grease bottoms only of 12 medium muffin cups or line with paper baking cups.", "Beat egg slightly in medium bowl.", "Stir in remaining ingredients, just until moistened.", "Divide batter into cups.", "Bake until golden brown, 15 to 18 minutes."]

Title: Fish Soup
Ingredients: ["4 medium onions, sliced", "1 stalk celery, chopped", "2 lb. mild fish, cut into serving size pieces", "1 tsp. salt", "2 Tbsp. margarine or butter", "5 c. milk", "1/2 c. sour cream", "2 Tbsp. finely chopped dill pickle", "1/4 lb. Velveeta cheese", "4 tsp. horseradish"]
Recipe: ["Place onions, celery, salt, fish and butter in large saucepan. Add milk and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer 15 to 20 minutes. Add sour cream, pickle and horseradish.", "Add Velveeta cheese. Stir until melted.", "Thicken with flour, if desired. Serve."]

Title: Slaw
Ingredients: ["1 bag chopped cabbage or fresh cabbage", "1 bell pepper, chopped", "1 onion, chopped", "1 jar pimento", "1 c. oil", "1 c. sugar", "3/4 c. white vinegar", "1 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. celery seed"]
Recipe: ["Mix chopped cabbage, bell pepper and onion together.", "Stir in pimento.", "Place oil, sugar, vinegar, salt and celery seed in pan. Bring to a boil. Boil about 3 minutes.", "Pour over slaw mixture. Double recipe if you need to."]

Title: Sweet And Sour Slaw
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 qt. cabbage, shredded", "1/2 c. green peppers, chopped", "1/2 c. celery, chopped", "1/2 c. carrots, shredded", "1 small onion, chopped", "2 c. cold water", "1 tsp. salt", "3/4 c. sugar", "1/2 c. vinegar", "1/2 c. water"]
Recipe: ["Combine cabbage, green peppers, celery, carrots and onion. Let stand in cold water and salt for 1 hour.", "Boil sugar, vinegar and 1/2 cup water.", "Drain vegetables.", "Pour cooled boiled mixture over cabbage and chill."]

Title: Broccoli And Cauliflower Salad
Ingredients: ["1 cauliflower", "1 broccoli", "1 c. cheese (mild and grated)", "1 red onion", "bacon bits"]
Recipe: ["Cut cauliflower, broccoli and onion into bite size pieces."]

Title: Taco Salad(Meatless)
Ingredients: ["2/3 head lettuce, torn small", "2 or 3 tomatoes, chopped", "sweet onion, chopped", "16 oz. can kidney beans, drained and rinsed", "1/2 lb. grated Cheddar cheese", "4 oz. Ranch dressing", "4 oz. Italian dressing", "8 oz. bag nacho Doritos, crushed"]
Recipe: ["Mix all ingredients together, except Doritos.", "Add them just before serving.", "(Celery, cucumber or black olives may also be added if desired.)"]

Title: Spinach Dip
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 c. sour cream", "1 c. mayonnaise", "1 pkg. Mrs. Knorr leek soup mix", "1 (10 oz.) pkg. chopped frozen spinach", "1 (8 oz.) can water chestnuts, chopped and drained", "1/2 c. chopped green onions"]
Recipe: ["Cook spinach as directed on package; cool, then drain and squeeze out all liquid.", "Combine all ingredients.", "Refrigerate at least 2 hours or overnight."]

Title: Cherries Jubilee

Recipe: ["Put ice cream in dessert bowls.", "Store in freezer.", "In large saucepan, mix cherries with juice, cornstarch and cinnamon.", "Stir over low heat until clear and slightly thick.", "Add brandy and Kirsch.", "Pour cherries and sauce over ice cream.", "Serve."]

Title: Orange Balls
Ingredients: ["1 stick margarine", "1 box powdered sugar", "1 (6 oz.) can frozen orange juice", "3 c. vanilla wafer crumbs", "1 c. chopped nuts", "7 oz. Angel Flake coconut"]
Recipe: ["Cream margarine and sugar.", "Add orange juice, crumbs and nuts. Pinch off small pieces and make into balls.", "Roll in coconut. Refrigerate until firm.", "Makes about 72 balls."]

Title: Dilled Potato Salad With Wurst
Ingredients: ["4 large potatoes", "4 slices bacon, cut up", "1/2 c. chopped dill pickles", "3/4 c. dill pickle liquid", "1/2 tsp. caraway seed", "1 Tbsp. chopped parsley", "1/2 c. chopped onion", "1/2 c. chopped celery", "1 lb. knockwurst or hot dogs", "1/2 Tbsp. sugar", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/2 tsp. dry mustard"]
Recipe: ["Cut boiled potatoes into thick slices.", "In skillet, over medium heat, cook bacon.", "Add celery, onion and pickles.", "Cook, stirring, until tender (3 to 5 minutes).", "Stir in potatoes, knockwurst, pickle liquid, sugar, caraway seed, mustard and salt. Cover and cook over low heat, turning potatoes occasionally, until tender (10 minutes).", "Knockwurst may be cooked separately.", "Serves 4."]

Title: Skillet Cookies
Ingredients: ["2 eggs", "2 c. sugar", "2 c. chopped dates", "2 c. chopped pecans", "1 stick butter", "4 c. Rice Krispies (1 c. at a time)", "coconut"]
Recipe: ["Melt all except Rice Krispies on medium heat.", "Cook 5 minutes or until gooey.", "Add Rice Krispies, one cup at a time.", "Cook a couple of minutes.", "Cool enough to handle.", "Butter hands.", "Shape into small balls and roll in coconut."]

Title: J. B.'S Chili
Ingredients: ["1 lb. ground beef", "4 Tbsp. chili seasoning mix", "1 (15 oz.) can tomato sauce", "2 (15 oz.) cans chili mix beans or kidney beans", "1 tsp. garlic powder", "1 tsp. chili powder", "1 tsp. pepper"]
Recipe: ["Brown ground beef on medium-high.", "Then stir in (thoroughly) the remainder of ingredients.", "Serves 4."]

Title: Marinara Sauce
Ingredients: ["2 pkg. Italian sausage", "3 (14 1/2 oz.) cans stewed tomatoes", "1 (14 1/2 oz.) can tomato sauce", "1 to 2 (6 oz.) cans tomato paste", "2 medium onions, minced", "2 Tbsp. marjoram", "2 Tbsp. oregano leaves", "2 Tbsp. sweet basil", "1 tsp. rosemary leaves", "10 cloves garlic, minced", "salt to taste"]
Recipe: ["Brown sausage.", "Add onion and garlic.", "Herbs may be added at this time to enhance the flavor.", "Add remaining ingredients. Simmer 2 to 4 hours.", "Yield:", "3 to 4 meals."]

Title: Strawberry Pie
Ingredients: ["1 c. sugar", "1 c. water", "6 tsp. cornstarch", "4 Tbsp. strawberry jello mix", "2 c. whole strawberries"]
Recipe: ["Mix sugar, water and cornstarch together.", "Cook on low heat until mixture becomes clear, remove from heat.", "Add strawberry jello mix.", "Place strawberries in baked pie shell.", "Pour mixture over berries; let chill in refrigerator for 2 hours.", "Top with Cool Whip."]

Title: Paper Bag Apple Pie(Serves 6 To 8)
Ingredients: ["4 to 6 large cooking apples", "1/2 c. sugar", "2 Tbsp. all-purpose flour", "1/2 tsp. nutmeg", "cinnamon to taste", "1 (9-inch) unbaked pie shell", "2 Tbsp. lemon juice", "1/2 c. all-purpose flour", "1/2 c. butter or margarine", "1/2 c. sugar", "4 peaches, pitted and sliced", "2 Tbsp. honey", "2 Tbsp. butter or margarine", "1 c. heavy cream", "1/4 c. confectioners sugar", "2 Tbsp. peach Schnapps or 1 tsp. vanilla extract", "4 refrigerated biscuits, baked and cut in half", "ground nutmeg and mint sprigs for garnish"]
Recipe: ["In skillet over medium-high heat, cook peaches and honey in butter for 5 to 7 minutes until tender.", "In mixing bowl, beat cream, confectioners sugar and peach Schnapps until soft peaks form."]

Title: Microwave Nutty Apple
Ingredients: ["4 small red or golden delicious apples, cored", "2 tsp. firmly packed brown sugar, divided", "2 Tbsp. chunky peanut butter", "ground cinnamon"]
Recipe: ["Into 4 glass cupcake pans, place each apple.", "Sprinkle core cavity of each apple with 1/4 teaspoon brown sugar.", "Fill each with 1 1/2 teaspoons peanut butter and top each with 1/4 teaspoon brown sugar.", "Sprinkle each apple with an equal amount of cinnamon and microwave on High for 3 to 4 minutes.", "Makes 4 servings."]

Title: Squash Pickles
Ingredients: ["4 qt. sliced squash", "6 large onions", "1/4 c. salt", "5 c. sugar", "3 c. vinegar", "1 Tbsp. turmeric", "1 1/2 Tbsp. celery seed"]
Recipe: ["Combine sliced squash, onion and salt and soak 3 hours in 2 to 3 trays of ice cubes.", "Mix remaining ingredients.", "Drain squash and onion.", "Add to vinegar mixture and bring back to boil.", "Pack in jars while hot."]

Title: Zucchini Casserole
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 lb. zucchini", "1 can cream of mushroom soup or chicken or celery", "1/2 c. shredded Cheddar cheese", "1/2 c. sour cream", "1 large carrot, grated", "1 medium onion, chopped fine", "1 stick margarine, melted", "8 oz. pkg. Pepperidge Farm herb seasoned stuffing mix", "salt and pepper to taste"]
Recipe: ["Cut zucchini into 1/2-inch slices and cook in water for 8 minutes.", "Drain and add mixture of soup, cheese, sour cream, carrot, onion, salt and pepper.", "In separate bowl, mix stuffing mix and 1 stick margarine, melted."]

Title: Four Cheese-Cheese Ball
Ingredients: ["2 lb. Velveeta cheese", "2 pkg. Cheddar cheese, grated", "1 dash onion or garlic powder", "parsley, chopped (optional)", "2 oz. cream cheese", "1 sq. Blue cheese", "chopped pecans (optional)"]
Recipe: ["Soften all cheese.", "Blend together and form into ball.", "Roll ball in pecans and parsley."]

Title: Beef And Bean Sloppy Joes
Ingredients: ["1 lb. ground beef", "1/2 c. chopped onion", "1 (16 oz.) can pork and beans", "1/2 c. barbecue sauce", "6 hamburger buns"]
Recipe: ["Brown ground beef and onion in 10-inch skillet; drain.", "Stir in beans and barbecue sauce.", "Simmer about 15 minutes or until thickened.", "Serve on hamburger buns."]

Title: 7 Cup Fruit Salad
Ingredients: ["1 c. grated coconut", "1 c. cottage cheese", "1 c. sour cream", "1 c. chopped nuts", "1 c. crushed pineapple", "1 c. fruit cocktail, drained", "1 c. miniature marshmallows"]
Recipe: ["Combine all ingredients, then serve chilled.", "Flavor improves in the refrigerator."]

Title: Sausage And Cheese Dip
Ingredients: ["1 lb. sausage, cooked and drained", "1 can Ro-Tel tomatoes", "1 box Velveeta cheese"]
Recipe: ["Melt cheese and Ro-Tel in crock-pot.", "Add sausage.", "Heat and serve with chips."]

Title: Strawberries With White Chocolate Custard Sauce
Ingredients: ["4 large egg yolks", "2 Tbsp. sugar", "1 c. heavy cream", "1/4 c. milk", "1/2 vanilla bean, split lengthwise", "3 oz. good quality white chocolate, chopped", "6 c. small strawberries, rinsed and hulled (if berries are large, halve them)"]
Recipe: ["In bowl, whisk yolks and sugar. In saucepan, bring cream, milk and vanilla bean to a boil. Gradually whisk hot cream mixture into yolk mixture. Return this mixture to saucepan; over medium heat, stir constantly with heat-resistant rubber spatula, 3 minutes until thick enough to coat spatula (do not let boil). Remove from heat. Add chocolate, stirring to melt. Strain through fine sieve into bowl. Remove bean; scrape out seeds into sauce. Place bowl in large bowl filled with ice cubes and water. Stir sauce until very cold. Place strawberries in 6 dessert glasses. Spoon 3 tablespoons custard sauce over each serving."]

Title: Cranberry Salad
Ingredients: ["1 (6 oz.) pkg. strawberry Jell-O", "2 c. boiling water", "1/2 c. orange juice", "1 can whole cranberry sauce", "1 c. diced celery", "1 c. crushed pineapple, drained", "1 Tbsp. orange rind, grated"]
Recipe: ["Mix Jell-O and boiling water.", "Add orange juice and remaining ingredients.", "Pour in 13 x 9-inch pan and set in refrigerator. Cut in squares to serve.", "This is the salad served at our bazaar at Drummond Chapel."]

Title: Meatballs, Rice And Gravy
Ingredients: ["2 lb. ground beef", "1 pkg. Lipton onion soup mix", "2 cans cream of mushroom soup", "1 c. milk", "hot cooked rice"]
Recipe: ["Knead onion soup in ground beef.", "Roll the beef into meatballs and brown in Dutch oven; drain fat off meatballs.", "Add 2 cans of cream of mushroom soup and 1 can of milk to meatballs.", "Let simmer about 1 hour.", "Turn heat off.", "Let set for another hour.", "This is one recipe that the longer it sets the better it tastes.", "Serve meatballs on bed of rice and don't forget the gravy."]

Title: Belle Helene(Chocolate Strawberry Dip)
Ingredients: ["1/2 c. whipping cream", "1 (4 oz.) pkg. sweet baking chocolate", "1/2 tsp. orange extract", "1/4 tsp. grated orange rind"]
Recipe: ["Heat whipping cream until hot (do not boil!).", "Remove from heat, add chocolate and stir until melted.", "Stir in extract and rind, chill.", "Can be stored and is delicious on ice cream."]

Title: Mexican Salad
Ingredients: ["1 (30 oz.) can kidney beans", "1 medium onion", "1 medium bell pepper", "2 medium tomatoes", "1 c. shredded Cheddar cheese", "1 small bottle Catalina dressing"]
Recipe: ["Line salad bowl with drained beans. Layer chopped onion over beans.", "Layer chopped bell pepper over onion.", "Layer chopped tomatoes over bell pepper.", "Top with shredded cheese."]

Title: Mama'S Hamburger Dish
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 lb. ground hamburger meat", "1 large onion or 2 medium onions", "1 large can tomatoes", "salt and pepper to taste"]
Recipe: ["Make hamburger into patties.", "Flour and brown them in a small amount of oil.", "Set meat aside.", "Slice onions and set aside.", "Crush tomatoes and put them into the skillet.", "Layer other ingredients in the pan and cover with water.", "Simmer 30 minutes.", "(Flour on the patties will make the gravy.)", "Yields 6 servings."]

Title: Cabbage Patch Soup
Ingredients: ["2 1/2 lbs. lean ground beef, if not lean drain before adding spices", "1 c. onion, chopped", "2 cloves garlic, minced", "1 c. green pepper, chopped (optional)", "1 (6 oz.) can tomato paste", "5 or more medium tomatoes, chopped", "1 head cabbage, chopped", "4 large cans kidney beans, rinsed and drained", "2 Tbsp. chili powder (more or less to taste)", "8-10 c. water", "salt and pepper to taste", "1 tsp. oregano", "1 Tbsp. parsley (optional)", "green onions, (tops only) chopped", "6 beef bouillon cubes"]
Recipe: ["Brown ground beef in a large skillet with onion, garlic and green pepper. Add tomato paste, tomatoes, chili powder, oregano, parsley and kidney beans. Salt and pepper to taste. Add in the bouillon cubes and cabbage. Slowly add desired amount of water. Bring to a boil, cover and reduce heat and simmer for one hour."]

Title: Hamburger Soup
Ingredients: ["1 lb. hamburger", "1 (16 oz.) can tomatoes", "3 carrots, sliced", "2 medium potatoes", "1 medium onion", "1/2 c. diced celery", "3 c. water", "3 beef bouillon cubes", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/4 tsp. pepper", "1/4 tsp. oregano", "1 to 2 c. frozen vegetables (your choice)"]
Recipe: ["Brown hamburger.", "Mix with all other ingredients and simmer 1 hour, stirring occasionally."]

Title: Cornbread Stuffings
Ingredients: ["1 c. onions", "1 c. celery", "1/2 c. oleo", "5 c. cornbread crumbs", "3 c. soft bread crumbs", "salt and pepper to taste", "sage to taste", "1/2 c. cooking sherry", "4 boiled eggs"]
Recipe: ["Saute onions, celery and oleo until tender.", "Mix all together, mixing well!"]

Title: Chocolate Cake
Ingredients: ["1 German chocolate cake mix", "1 jar caramel ice cream topping", "3 Heath bars", "1 can Eagle Brand", "12 oz. Cool Whip"]
Recipe: ["Bake German chocolate cake as directed on box.", "Cool for 1/2 hour.", "Using the handle of a wooden spoon, poke several holes close together.", "Mix Eagle Brand and caramel topping; pour over cake.", "Cover with Cool Whip.", "Break Heath bars into pieces and sprinkle on top of cake.", "I use a 9 x 13-inch pan.", "Heath bars break easier if frozen."]

Title: Holiday Wassail
Ingredients: ["64 oz. carton orange juice", "64 oz. jar apple juice", "32 oz. jar cranberry juice cocktail", "12 oz. can frozen lemonade concentrate, thawed and undiluted", "2-inch stick cinnamon", "1 Tbsp. whole cloves", "2 whole oranges, sliced"]
Recipe: ["Press cloves into orange slices.", "Combine all and heat.", "Simmer about 5 minutes and serve.", "Makes 5 1/2-quarts, about 30 (6 ounce) servings."]

Title: Zucchini Relish
Ingredients: ["10 c. coarsely ground squash", "2 c. red peppers", "2 c. green peppers", "4 c. onion", "1/3 c. salt", "1 tsp. turmeric", "1 tsp. curry powder", "1 tsp. celery salt", "1/2 tsp. black pepper", "1 Tbsp. cornstarch", "4 c. sugar", "2 1/2 c. apple cider or white vinegar"]
Recipe: ["Remove tips from squash.", "Put squash, red peppers, green peppers, onions and salt in a large enamel kettle.", "Mix well and let stand in the refrigerator overnight.", "Drain and rinse in cold water.", "Put in a large saucepan and add turmeric, curry powder, celery salt, pepper, cornstarch, sugar and vinegar.", "Bring to a boil and boil for 20 to 25 minutes, stirring constantly to keep from sticking.", "Pack in pint jars and seal.", "If desired, one or two hot peppers can be added."]

Title: Holiday Fruit Salad
Ingredients: ["3 apples, chopped", "2 cans coconut", "6 bananas", "1 jar cherries, drained", "1 small can pineapple drained", "1 c. chopped pecans", "1 large can fruit cocktail, drained", "1 c. mayonnaise", "3/4 c. sugar"]
Recipe: ["Mix all ingredients and save one can coconut and about 2 dozen cherries to decorate top.", "This looks really nice in a cut glass bowl for the holidays."]

Title: German Sweet Chocolate Pie
Ingredients: ["1 pie shell, baked (lightly brown)", "1/3 c. butter", "1/3 c. brown sugar (packed)", "1/3 c. pecans, chopped", "1/3 c. Angel Flake coconut", "1 pkg. (big) Jell-O vanilla pudding and pie filling", "1 pkg. German chocolate, broken in pieces", "2 1/2 c. milk", "1 c. Cool Whip"]
Recipe: ["Combine butter, brown sugar, pecans and coconut in saucepan. Heat until butter and sugar are melted.", "Stir.", "Spread in bottom of hot pie shell.", "Return to oven for 5 minutes.", "Cool."]

Title: Creamy Spinach Dip
Ingredients: ["1 (8 oz.) sour cream", "1 c. mayonnaise", "1/2 tsp. celery salt", "1/2 tsp. dill weed", "1/4 tsp. onion salt", "1/4 c. chopped green onions", "3 c. frozen cut leaf spinach, well drained", "1 (8 oz.) can water chestnuts, drained, finely chopped", "3 Tbsp. chopped red pepper (optional)"]
Recipe: ["In medium bowl, combine sour cream, mayonnaise and seasonings. Stir in onions, spinach, water chestnuts and pepper.", "Cover; refrigerate to blend flavors.", "Serve with crisp vegetable dippers, assorted crackers or bread.", "Makes 3 1/2 cups."]

Title: Oreo Banana Pudding
Ingredients: ["1 large pkg. vanilla instant pudding", "3 large bananas", "1 pkg. Oreo cookies", "1 medium carton Cool Whip"]
Recipe: ["Mix pudding by directions.", "Let set a few minutes.", "Add 1/2 bowl Cool Whip.", "In large deep bowl, slice a layer of bananas. Arrange cookies over bananas.", "Repeat.", "Cover with Cool Whip. Chill before serving."]

Title: Mrs. E. Leo Andrews Valentine Icebox Cake
Ingredients: ["1 pkg. strawberry jello", "1 c. boiling water", "16 marshmallows, quartered", "1 c. crushed sweetened strawberries", "1 c. cream, whipped", "angel food cake, sliced or broken up"]
Recipe: ["Dissolve the jello in the boiling water.", "Chill until mixture begins to thicken. Fold in the marshmallows, strawberries and whipped cream. Pour mixture over sliced or broken up angel food cake. Leave in refrigerator overnight."]

Title: Herb Vinaigrette Dressing
Ingredients: ["1/3 c. cider vinegar", "1 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. oregano or tarragon", "1/4 c. fresh parsley, minced", "1/2 c. sunflower oil", "1/2 c. olive oil", "1/2 tsp. dried basil or 1 tsp. fresh", "1/2 tsp. dry mustard", "1/4 tsp. black pepper", "2 cloves garlic, minced"]
Recipe: ["Combine all of the ingredients except the oils.", "Shake well. Add the oils and shake.", "Great over vegetables, pasta, salads, greens, etc."]

Title: Strawberry Fruit Salad
Ingredients: ["1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "3/4 c. sugar", "20 oz. can crushed pineapple, drained", "1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen strawberries, thawed", "1/2 c. pecans, chopped", "2 bananas, mashed", "1 (9 oz.) carton Cool Whip"]
Recipe: ["Beat cream cheese until fluffy. Add sugar and blend.", "In another bowl, combine fruits and nuts.", "Fold in Cool Whip and combine with cream cheese mixture."]

Title: Takahashi'S Teriyaki Sauce
Ingredients: ["12 oz. bottle soy sauce", "3/4 c. saki or dry white wine", "1/2 tsp. powdered ginger", "2/3 c. sugar", "1/4 tsp. garlic salt", "2 tsp. Accent"]
Recipe: ["Stir", "dry", "ingredients", "together, then add liquid.", "You should have a", "sweet, salty taste.", "This is good on beef, pork and chicken."]

Title: Creamed Cabbage
Ingredients: ["1 head cabbage, chopped", "1/2 c. oil", "1 Tbsp. cornmeal", "1 Tbsp. flour", "1/2 c. milk"]
Recipe: ["Boil cabbage in heavy pan with oil 15 minutes on medium heat on stove top; cabbage will be steamed down.", "Add milk, flour and cornmeal.", "Cover and cook on low heat 20 minutes or until thick. Salt and pepper to taste.", "Serve warm."]

Title: Strawberry Pie
Ingredients: ["1 box strawberry Jell-O", "1 c. sugar", "1 3/4 c. boiling water", "3 Tbsp. cornstarch, mixed with 1/4 c. cold water", "1 pt. fresh strawberries"]
Recipe: ["Mix the Jell-O, sugar and boiling water.", "Mix the cornstarch and 1/4 cup cold water.", "Combine ingredients and bring to a boil until thick and clear.", "Cool, then refrigerate until cold. Combine with fresh strawberries.", "Put in baked and cooled shell. Serve with whipped cream.", "Keep refrigerated."]

Title: Ida'S Sugar Cookies
Ingredients: ["1 c. oleo", "1/2 c. white sugar", "1/2 c. brown sugar", "1 egg, beaten", "1 tsp. vanilla", "2 c. flour", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/2 tsp. soda", "extra sugar (to roll balls in)"]
Recipe: ["Sift together flour, salt and soda.", "Set aside.", "Cream until fluffy, oleo and sugars.", "Add slightly beaten egg and vanilla and mix well.", "Roll into 1-inch balls.", "Roll in sugar."]

Title: Mint Chocolate Chip Torte
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 c. chocolate wafer cookie crumbs", "1/4 c. butter or margarine, melted", "1 qt. mint chip ice cream, softened", "1 c. whipping cream, whipped", "Choco-Mint Sauce"]
Recipe: ["In a medium bowl, combine cookie crumbs and margarine; reserve 1/4 cup crumbs.", "Press remaining crumbs in bottom and 1/2-inch up sides of 9-inch springform pan.", "Freeze for 1 hour.", "Place ice-cream in large bowl; gently fold whipped cream into ice-cream. Spoon mixture into crust lined pan.", "Sprinkle with reserve crumbs. Cover and freeze for 5 hours or overnight."]

Title: Frozen Lemon Dessert
Ingredients: ["2 c. graham cracker crumbs", "1/4 c. margarine, melted", "2 c. Carnation milk, chilled", "1 c. sugar", "3/4 c. lemon juice"]
Recipe: ["Combine graham cracker crumbs and melted margarine.", "Press into the bottom of a 9 x 13-inch pan.", "Beat milk until fluffy. Add sugar and lemon juice.", "Mix well.", "Pour over graham cracker crust and freeze."]

Title: Marinated Mushrooms
Ingredients: ["3/4 c. olive oil", "1/3 c. wine vinegar", "1 clove garlic, halved", "1 bay leaf", "3/4 tsp. sugar", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/2 tsp. dried whole basil", "6 peppercorns", "1 1/2 lb. medium mushrooms, halved"]
Recipe: ["Combine all ingredients, except mushrooms, in a skillet. Bring to a boil, reduce heat and simmer for ten minutes.", "Stir in mushrooms and simmer for five minutes.", "Let cool.", "Cover and chill several hours.", "Drain before serving, removing garlic and bay leaf."]

Title: Breakfast Bread Pudding
Ingredients: ["2 eggs", "1 slice low calorie high fiber wheat bread, cubed", "2 pkg. artificial sweetener", "1/2 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. skim milk, scalded and cooled"]
Recipe: ["In a 1-quart casserole, beat eggs lightly.", "Add artificial sweetener, milk, bread and vanilla.", "Mix well.", "Cook on Medium-high power in microwave.", "Let set 5 minutes.", "If not set, cook 2 to 3 minutes longer at Medium power.", "Makes 2 servings."]

Title: Reba'S Lime Salad
Ingredients: ["1 large box lime gelatin", "1 c. hot water", "6 Tbsp. lemon juice", "1 c. mayonnaise", "1 c. pecans or walnuts, broken", "1 small can evaporated milk", "1 (20 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "2 (8 oz.) cartons cottage cheese"]
Recipe: ["Dissolve gelatin in hot water.", "Add lemon juice and stir well. Refrigerate until thickened.", "Beat until light and creamy.", "Add remaining ingredients and mix.", "Refrigerate until ready to serve."]

Title: Jambalaya
Ingredients: ["1 lb. Italian sausage (hot, sweet or turkey)", "1 (14 oz.) can crushed tomatoes", "1 small bell pepper, chopped", "1 medium onion, chopped", "2 c. chicken broth or bouillon", "1 c. uncooked long cooking rice", "1/2 tsp. red pepper"]
Recipe: ["Brown and crumble sausage (use 1 tablespoon oil if browning turkey sausage).", "Add one chopped medium", "onion and one chopped bell pepper and saute until softened.", "Add all remaining ingredients.", "Cover and simmer on top of stove for 20 to 30 minutes until rice is cooked through.", "Serves 6 to 8.", "May be frozen and takes well to reheating in the microwave."]

Title: Mini Pizzas
Ingredients: ["1 lb. hamburg", "1 lb. bulk sausage", "1 lb. Velveeta cheese", "1 tsp. garlic powder", "1 tsp. onion salt", "1/2 tsp. basil", "1/2 tsp. oregano", "pepper (optional)", "6 to 8 English muffins"]
Recipe: ["Brown hamburg and sausage.", "Add spices to meat while cooking. After meat is browned, add cheese until melted.", "Put cut English muffins on cookie sheet.", "Top with meat mixture. Put under broiler until bubbly."]

Title: Creamy Cocoa Frosting
Ingredients: ["2 2/3 c. confectioners sugar, sifted", "1/3 c. cocoa", "1/3 c. butter, softened", "3 to 4 Tbsp. milk"]
Recipe: ["Sift together cocoa and sugar.", "Add butter and milk.", "Stir until well blended."]

Title: Black Forest Trifle
Ingredients: ["1 chocolate cake, prepared in 9 x 13 pan", "1 box white chocolate pudding mix", "1 c. sour cream (light)", "1 (6 oz.) Cool Whip (Lite)", "1 can cherry pie filling", "2 oz. Amaretto", "1 small pkg. strawberry jello", "1 c. water (only)", "3 Tbsp. lemon juice"]
Recipe: ["Take strawberry jello and dilute with water. Add lemon juice. Let cool a little. Pour over layers in bowl. Set aside for several hours or overnight in a cool place. Don't panic if bananas turn a little dark. When mixture is set, fix vanilla custard (I use several packages of instant vanilla pudding) and cover layers about 1-inch. Cover all layers with whipped cream (I use about 3 1/2 pints of whipping cream). Let set for about 1 hour in refrigerator."]

Title: All American Clam Chowder
Ingredients: ["3 slices bacon", "1/2 c. minced onions", "1 (7 oz.) can minced clams (save juice)", "1 c. cubed potatoes", "1 can cream of celery soup", "1 1/2 c. milk", "dash of pepper"]
Recipe: ["Cook bacon in pan until crisp.", "Remove from pan and break into 1-inch pieces.", "Brown onion in bacon fat.", "Add clam juice and potatoes.", "Cover and cook about 15 minutes until potatoes are done.", "Blend in bacon pieces and minced clams the other ingredients.", "Heat but do not boil.", "Bacon may be used as garnish."]

Title: Fruit Punch
Ingredients: ["1 frozen can orange juice", "1 frozen can apple juice", "1 (46 oz.) can pineapple juice", "1 (46 oz.) can Hawaiian Punch"]
Recipe: ["Dilute apple juice as directed.", "Add orange juice; stir well. Add pineapple juice; stir well.", "Add Hawaiian Punch;", "mix well."]

Title: Butterscotch Cookies
Ingredients: ["1/2 c. butter", "1/2 c. evaporated milk", "2 c. brown sugar", "3 c. raw oatmeal", "1 tsp. grated orange rind", "1/2 c. chopped nuts", "1 c. small marshmallows"]

Title: Easy Taco Dip

Title: Raw Apple Cake
Ingredients: ["3 C. flour", "1 tsp. baking soda", "1 tsp. cinnamon", "1/2 tsp. salt", "4 eggs", "2 C. sugar", "1 1/4 C. cooking oil", "1 1/2 tsp. vanilla", "3 C. raw, sliced apples", "1 C. raisins, soft", "1 C. pecans or walnuts, chopped, optional"]
Recipe: ["Sift together the flour, soda, salt and cinnamon. Beat eggs and add sugar, oil, vanilla and blend. Stir together the flour mixture and egg mixture. Add the apples and raisins. Stir together, pour into a bundt pan (greased and floured or sugared). Bake at 325 degrees for 50 to 55 minutes."]

Title: Cheese Ball
Ingredients: ["2 - 8 oz. cream cheese, softened", "1 small can crushed pineapple, drained", "1/4 c. bell pepper, finely chopped", "1 Tbsp. onion, finely chopped", "1 tsp. Lawry's seasoned salt", "1 c. finely chopped pecans"]
Recipe: ["Mix all ingredients except pecans. Add pecans and mix well; form into ball. Refrigerate overnight, then roll in chopped nuts to cover outside."]

Title: Golden Fudge
Ingredients: ["1 lb. light brown sugar", "1 c. white sugar", "1/2 c. oleo", "1 c. evaporated milk", "2 (6 oz.) pkg. butterscotch morsels", "1 jar (7 1/2 - 10 oz.) marshmallow creme", "1 c. chopped walnuts", "1/2 c. golden raisins (I use more)", "1 tsp. rum flavoring", "1/2 tsp. vanilla", "pinch of salt"]
Recipe: ["Combine in 2 1/2 qt. saucepan brown and white sugars, milk and oleo. Place over medium heat and stir constantly till oleo is melted. Cook over medium heat stirring occasionally till mixture forms soft ball when dropped in cold water, or till temperature reaches 238 degrees on candy thermometer. Remove from heat - stir in butterscotch morsels and marshmallow creme till thoroughly blended. Add nuts, raisins, salt, rum and vanilla. Pour into 2 greased 8 inch square pans and chill. When cold cut into squares."]

Title: Carrot Salad
Ingredients: ["1 small cucumber, unpeeled and sliced thin", "1 c. diced celery", "1 medium onion, sliced thin", "1/2 chopped green pepper", "3 c. cooked carrots", "1 can tomato soup", "1/2 c. vinegar", "1/2 c. oil", "1 tsp. salt", "2 pkg. Sweet 'N Low (or Tbsp. sugar)"]
Recipe: ["This is a \"make ahead\" dish.", "Mix all ingredients except cucumbers and refrigerate at least 24 hours.", "While mix is setting, soak cucumbers in salt water.", "Drain cucumbers and add to carrot mixture just before serving."]

Title: Double Cooked Pork
Ingredients: ["1/2 lb. pork (bacon or leg)", "1 green onion", "2 slices ginger", "2 green peppers", "3 red peppers", "3 garlic cloves", "1 Tbsp. sweet soybean paste", "1/2 Tbsp. hot bean paste", "1 Tbsp. soy sauce", "1 tsp. sugar", "3 Tbsp. oil"]
Recipe: ["Boil the whole pork with a little wine, ginger and green onion for 30 minutes.", "Remove.", "When cool, cut into very thin slices. Cut the green and red peppers into 1-inch squares.", "Slice garlic. You may use green garlic if you have. Mix sweet soybean paste with soy sauce, sugar and hot bean paste in a bowl.", "Stir-fry pork slices in 3 tablespoons oil for 1 minute.", "Add garlic, green and red peppers; stir 1 more minute.", "Remove from pan.", "Use the remaining oil to stir-fry the sweet soybean paste for 10 seconds. Return pork mixture.", "Stir well and serve."]

Title: Never Fail Noodles
Ingredients: ["2 egg yolks", "2 Tbsp. cream or milk", "1/4 tsp. baking powder", "1 tsp. shortening", "1/4 tsp. salt", "2/3 c. flour"]
Recipe: ["Mix egg yolks, cream and shortening.", "Add sifted flour, baking powder and salt.", "Roll out thin on a floured board.", "Let dry. Roll up and cut into desired size noodles.", "These noodles will keep 6 months in freezer."]

Title: Dirt Dessert
Ingredients: ["1 box Jello chocolate pudding mix", "milk", "1 pkg. Oreos", "4 oz. Cool Whip", "gummy worms"]
Recipe: ["Crush Oreos.", "Mix Jello pudding according to directions. Fold in Cool Whip and half of crushed Oreos.", "Pour into dish and cover with remaining Oreos.", "Garnish with gummy worms. Refrigerate."]

Title: Zucchini Pie
Ingredients: ["1 c. Bisquick", "1/2 c. + 1/2 Tbsp. oil", "4 eggs beaten", "3 zucchini sliced thin", "1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese", "1 onion finely chopped", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/4 tsp. pepper", "1/2 tsp. oregano", "1 Tbsp. parsley"]
Recipe: ["Mix all ingredients.", "Pour into a greased 9 inch pie pan."]

Title: Creamy Chocolate Frosting
Ingredients: ["3 c. confectioners sugar", "1/4 c. hot water", "1 egg", "1/2 c. butter", "4 pkg. Baker's Redi-Blend"]
Recipe: ["Mix 3 cups confectioners sugar with 1/4 cup hot water.", "Beat in 1 egg and 1/2 cup soft butter until smooth. Add 4 packages Baker's Redi-Blend; beat until creamy. Frosts 2 (9-inch) layers."]

Title: Angel Cordial Delight Cake
Ingredients: ["1 (8 oz.) bottle maraschino cherries", "1 (4 oz.) pkg. marshmallows", "1 (9 oz.) can crushed pineapple", "1 Tbsp. unflavored gelatin", "1 c. milk", "1 pt. heavy cream, whipped", "1 c. blanched sliced almonds or walnuts", "1 (8-inch) angel food cake"]
Recipe: ["Cut cherries in quarters and marshmallows into small pieces. Drain pineapple and combine with cherries and marshmallows.", "Let stand about 2 hours.", "Soften gelatin in 1/2 cup cold milk.", "Heat remaining 1/2 cup milk and add to softened gelatin.", "Refrigerate until gelatin is partially set.", "Add fruit mixture and nuts.", "Fold into whipped cream.", "Slice cake horizontally into 3 equal sized layers.", "Spread fruit filling between cake layers and over the top and sides of the cake.", "Chill until mixture is firm.", "Refrigerate until served.", "May be made 1 day prior to serving.", "Yield:", "16 servings."]

Title: Homemade Pedialyte - Army Style
Ingredients: ["Kool-Aid with double sugar", "2 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. salt substitute"]
Recipe: ["Stir well.", "Check with Dr. before using for babies.", "Good for adults for replacing body fluids."]

Title: Tuna Spread
Ingredients: ["1 (6 oz.) can tuna (water pack)", "3 Tbsp. Ranch dressing", "1/2 tsp. lemon juice", "3 Tbsp. minced celery", "1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce"]
Recipe: ["Mix well and serve with crackers. (Or for sandwiches.)"]

Title: Stir-Fry Pepper Steak
Ingredients: ["2 Tbsp. oil or 1/2 stick butter", "1 tsp. garlic salt", "1 lb. round steak (cut into strips)", "2 medium green peppers (seeded and cut strips)", "1 c. slice mushroom (cooked)"]
Recipe: ["Put the oil in a skillet, sprinkle in the garlic salt and place over medium heat until hot. Add the steak, green peppers, and mushrooms to skillet. Cook, stirring often, until the meat is cooked as done as you like."]

Title: Louisiana Crab And Crawfish Cakes With Lemon-Fennel Remoulade(Serves 8)
Ingredients: ["1 lb. fresh crawfish tail meat", "1 lb. lump crabmeat, cleaned for shells", "1 c. bread crumbs (dry)", "1 Tbsp. olive oil", "1/2 c. finely diced onions", "1/2 c. finely diced celery", "1/2 c. finely diced green pepper", "2 Tbsp. finely diced jalapeno pepper (no seed)", "1 tsp. fresh thyme, chopped", "1 tsp. fresh basil, chopped", "1 Tbsp. fresh parsley, chopped", "1 Tbsp. garlic minced", "1 tsp. dry mustard", "1 Tbsp. lemon juice", "1 Tbsp. Dijon mustard", "1 Tbsp. Worcestershire", "1 tsp. Tabasco", "2 Tbsp. mayonnaise", "3 eggs", "pinch of Old Bay", "pinch of cayenne", "1 tsp. salt", "2 c. fresh bread crumbs"]
Recipe: ["Saute onions, celery and peppers lightly and allow to cool. Pick through crabmeat to remove all shell pieces.", "Fold all ingredients together.", "Gently mix so as not to break up crabmeat too much.", "Form into cakes (yield 16 pieces) and dredge in fresh bread crumbs.", "Saute on both sides until golden brown.", "Serve with Lemon-Fennel Remoulade."]

Title: Pralines
Ingredients: ["1 c. light brown sugar", "1 c. white sugar", "1/2 c. cream", "1 Tbsp. margarine", "1 tsp. vanilla", "2 c. pecans"]
Recipe: ["Mix sugars, cream and cook to soft ball stage.", "After mixture stops bubbling, add margarine, vanilla and pecans.", "Beat.", "Drop by tablespoons onto waxed paper.", "Allow to harden."]

Title: Poppy Seed Dressing
Ingredients: ["3/4 c. sugar", "1 tsp. dry mustard", "1 tsp. salt", "1/3 c. cider vinegar", "1 Tbsp. onion juice", "1 c. cooking oil", "1 1/2 Tbsp. poppy seed"]
Recipe: ["Combine sugar, mustard, salt, vinegar and onion juice in a bowl using mixer or rotary beater.", "Gradually beat in oil until mixture is thick and smooth.", "Fold in poppy seed.", "Store in refrigerator until ready to use.", "Makes about 2 cups."]

Title: Hot Sauce To Can
Ingredients: ["3 qt. peeled and chopped ripe tomatoes", "4 large onions, chopped", "5 to 15 jalapeno hot peppers", "3/4 c. vinegar", "1 bell pepper, chopped", "1 c. sugar", "2 tsp. salt", "1 Tbsp. cinnamon", "1 tsp. cloves", "1 tsp. allspice", "1 tsp. celery seed"]
Recipe: ["Drop in tomato mixture and simmer 1 hour.", "Sterilize jars and seal.", "Put rubber gloves on to grind or chop hot peppers.", "I make this and it is good on tortillas."]

Title: Fruit Pizza
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 c. flour", "1/4 c. sugar", "1/4 c. butter", "1/4 c. oil", "3 Tbsp. cold water", "2 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened", "1/4 c. sugar", "1/2 tsp. vanilla", "1 1/2 c. thinly sliced strawberries", "3 kiwi fruit, peeled and sliced", "1 banana, sliced (optional)", "1/2 c. blueberries", "1/2 c. halved red grapes", "Glaze"]
Recipe: ["You will also need vegetable cooking spray."]

Title: Teriyaki Sauce
Ingredients: ["1/3 c. soy sauce", "1/4 c. oil", "2 Tbsp. catsup", "2 Tbsp. vinegar", "2 Tbsp. brown sugar", "3/4 c. beef or chicken stock", "1 tsp. chopped garlic", "1 tsp. parsley", "1/4 c. chopped onion"]
Recipe: ["Mix all ingredients in a jar and shake.", "Use to marinate chicken, beef or pork."]

Title: Hot German Potato Salad
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 lb. potatoes (about 4 medium, cut into halves)", "3 slices bacon", "1 medium onion, chopped (1/2 c.)", "1 Tbsp. flour", "1 Tbsp. sugar", "1 tsp. salt", "1/4 tsp. celery seed", "dash of pepper", "1/2 c. water", "1/4 c. vinegar"]
Recipe: ["Heat 1-inch salted water (1/2 teaspoon salt to 1 cup water) to boiling; add potatoes.", "Heat to boiling again; reduce heat.", "Cover and cook until tender, 20 to 25 minutes.", "Drain and cool.", "Fry bacon until crisp; drain.", "Cook and stir onion in bacon fat until tender.", "Stir in flour, sugar, salt, celery seed and pepper.", "Cook over low heat, stirring constantly until mixture is bubbly.", "Remove from heat, stir in water and vinegar.", "Heat to boiling, stirring constantly.", "Boil and stir 1 minute; remove from heat.", "Crumble bacon into hot mixture, then slice in warm potatoes.", "Cook, stirring gently to coat potato slices."]

Title: Mandarin Orange Meringue Gelatin
Ingredients: ["1 stick uncolored agar-agar (about 10 grams)", "2 c. water", "2 egg whites (room temperature)", "1 (11 oz.) can mandarins, drained", "1 1/2 c. sugar", "grated rind and juice of 1/2 lemon", "1 c. sliced strawberries"]
Recipe: ["Tear agar-agar into tiny pieces.", "Wash, drain, then soak in 2 cups water for 1 hour.", "Cook in a saucepan over medium heat for 8 to 10 minutes.", "Begin stirring after liquid comes to a simmer.", "Add sugar, continue cooking to reduce mixture by half.", "Cool."]

Title: Microwave Fruit Salad
Ingredients: ["1 small box vanilla pudding (not instant)", "1 can peaches", "1 can pineapple chunks", "2 cans mandarin oranges", "2 bananas", "1 can fruit cocktail", "coconut", "small marshmallows"]
Recipe: ["Drain fruit saving juices.", "Mix pudding and 3 cups of the juices.", "Microwave on High for 8 minutes.", "Add the fruit and chill."]

Title: Sausage Dip

Recipe: ["Brown meat with onion.", "Melt Velveeta, soup and picante sauce. Serve hot."]

Title: Jello Salad
Ingredients: ["2 large strawberry Jell-O", "3 c. hot water", "1 c. cherry pie filling", "1 c. crushed pineapple"]
Recipe: ["Mix all ingredients together and place in \"Pammed\" sheet cake pan.", "Let set in refrigerator until firm."]

Title: Peanut Butter Pie
Ingredients: ["1 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened", "2/3 c. honey", "1 (12 to 16 oz.) jar creamy peanut butter", "1 (8 oz.) tub whipped topping", "2 (1 oz.) sq. semi-sweet baking chocolate", "1/2 tsp. shortening", "1 graham cracker pie shell"]
Recipe: ["Beat cream cheese and honey together until well combined. Stir in peanut butter; mix well. Fold in thawed whipped topping. Spoon mixture into crust."]

Title: Cheese And Sausage Strata
Ingredients: ["1/2 lb. bulk pork sausage", "3/4 c. mushroom slices", "1/4 c. green onion slices", "1/2 lb. Velveeta, cubed", "4 c. fresh sourdough bread cubes", "1 c. milk", "4 eggs, beaten"]
Recipe: ["Brown sausage; drain.", "Add vegetables; continue cooking 5 minutes.", "Drain. Cool 10 minutes."]

Title: Summer Fruit Surprise
Ingredients: ["1 pkg. graham crackers, crushed", "1 stick margarine, melted", "dash of cinnamon (optional)", "1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened", "1 (8 oz.) tub Cool Whip", "1/3 c. sugar", "1 tsp. lemon juice (optional)", "1 to 2 Tbsp. milk", "1 1/2 to 2 c. fresh strawberries, blueberries or peaches", "crushed graham crackers for garnish"]
Recipe: ["Combine first 3 ingredients and spread on the bottom of a glass dish.", "With a mixer, blend the cream cheese and sugar until smooth.", "Add the Cool Whip and mix, then the lemon juice and mix. With a spatula, fold in the fruit.", "Place the mixture on top of the graham cracker crust and garnish with graham cracker crumbs. Chill.", "Refrigerate leftovers."]

Title: Broccoli Rice Casserole
Ingredients: ["1/2 c. chopped celery, do not cook", "1/2 c. chopped onion, do not cook", "1 small pkg. frozen broccoli, cook as directed", "1 c. rice, cooked", "1 small jar Cheez Whiz", "1 can cream of chicken soup", "1 small can Pet milk"]
Recipe: ["Heat together Cheez Whiz, chicken soup and Pet milk to make a hot sauce."]

Title: Potato Soup
Ingredients: ["6 c. cubed, peeled potatoes", "5 c. water", "2 cups chopped onion", "1/2 c. chopped celery", "1/2 c. thinly sliced carrots", "1/4 c. butter or margarine", "4 tsp. chicken bouillon granules", "2 tsp. salt", "1/4 tsp pepper", "1 can (12 oz.) evaporated milk", "3 Tbsp. chopped fresh parsley"]
Recipe: ["In a large slow cooker, combine the first nine ingredients. Cover and cook on high for 7 hours or until the vegetables are tender.", "Add milk and parsley, mix well.", "Cover and cook 30-60 minutes longer or until heated through."]

Title: Butterscotch Creme Pie Filling
Ingredients: ["1/2 tsp. salt", "1 c. water", "1 2/3 c. milk", "1 c. brown sugar, packed", "1/2 c. Softasilk cake flour", "1/3 c. butter", "3 egg yolks, slightly beaten", "1 1/2 tsp. vanilla"]
Recipe: ["Mix sugar, flour and salt in saucepan.", "Gradually stir in water and milk.", "Add butter.", "Cook over medium heat, stirring constantly, until mixture thickens.", "Boil 1 minute.", "Remove from heat.", "Stir half in egg yolks and blend into hot mixture in saucepan.", "Boil 1 minute more, stirring constantly.", "Remove from heat.", "Blend in vanilla."]

Title: Sea Island Salad
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 c. uncooked macaroni", "1/2 c. mayonnaise", "1/2 c. sour cream", "1/2 tsp. celery seed", "1/2 tsp. onion salt", "1 can tuna, drained", "1 (17 oz.) can small peas, drained", "3/4 c. diced mild Cheddar cheese", "2 tsp. minced green pepper", "1 small jar chopped pimentos"]
Recipe: ["Cook macaroni; drain and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes. Combine mayonnaise, sour cream, celery seed and onion salt.", "Stir into macaroni.", "Add remaining ingredients; toss and chill thoroughly.", "Serves 6."]

Title: Swedish Fruit Salad
Ingredients: ["2 whole eggs, beaten until light", "1/4 c. lemon juice", "1/2 c. sugar", "2 Tbsp. butter", "1 large can fruit cocktail, drained", "1 medium can of pineapple tidbits, drained", "1/4 c. maraschino cherries", "1/2 bag miniature marshmallows", "1 c. heavy cream"]
Recipe: ["Cook eggs, lemon juice and sugar over hot water until thick. Add butter, set aside and cool.", "Beat heavy cream and fold into cooled egg mixture.", "Add fruit and marshmallows.", "Let stand overnight."]

Title: Cupid'S Kiss(Frozen Drink)
Ingredients: ["1 oz. ice cream (vanilla)", "1 oz. vodka", "3 oz. strawberry mix"]
Recipe: ["Blend all together to desired consistency.", "Enjoy!!"]

Recipe: ["Combine flour, eggs, sour cream and salt and knead until the dough is soft, pliable and very elastic, 30 to 45 minutes of hand kneading."]

Title: Pumpkin Cheese Ball Or Dip

Recipe: ["Mix together well.", "Roll into a ball and sprinkle with pecans or paprika.", "Chill in refrigerator."]

Title: Grilled Vegetables Over Pasta
Ingredients: ["1/2 c. snow peas", "2 c. thickly sliced mushrooms", "2 red bell peppers, thickly sliced", "2 small zucchini, sliced", "2 medium red onions, sliced", "2 tomatoes, cored and cubed", "1 tsp. pepper", "1 (16 oz.) pkg. whole wheat pasta noodles"]
Recipe: ["Wash and prepare all vegetables (except tomatoes); toss with pepper.", "Wash and chop tomatoes.", "Toss the tomatoes with remaining herbs and spices."]

Title: Salmon Casserole
Ingredients: ["1 (1 lb.) can salmon", "1/2 c. chopped celery", "1/4 c. chopped onion", "1/2 c. chopped green pepper", "1/2 c. croutons", "1/2 c. shredded sharp Cheddar cheese", "1 Tbsp. sweet pickle relish", "1/2 c. mayonnaise", "1 Tbsp. lemon juice", "1 tsp. prepared mustard", "dash of pepper"]
Recipe: ["Drain, flake and remove bones in salmon.", "Reserve liquid in a bowl.", "In another bowl, combine salmon, celery, green pepper, onion, croutons, cheese and pickle relish.", "Set aside."]

Title: Pepper Steak
Ingredients: ["1 1/4 lb. beef top round or sirloin steak (about 1 inch thick)", "1/4 c. vegetable oil", "1 c. water", "1 medium onion, cut into 1/4-inch slices", "1/2 tsp. garlic salt", "1/4 tsp. ground ginger", "2 medium green peppers, cut into strips", "uncooked instant rice", "1 Tbsp. cornstarch", "2 to 3 tsp. sugar (optional)", "2 Tbsp. soy sauce", "2 medium tomatoes"]
Recipe: ["Trim fat from beef; cut beef into strips (2 x 1 x 1/4-inch). Heat oil in a large skillet.", "Add beef; cook, turning frequently until brown, about 5 minutes.", "Stir in water, onion, garlic salt and ginger.", "Heat to boiling; reduce heat.", "Cover and simmer 12 to 15 minutes for round steak, 5 to 8 minutes for sirloin.", "Add green pepper strips during last 5 minutes of simmering."]

Title: Chili With Beans(Prize Winning Recipe)

Recipe: ["Heat the chili, salsa, salt and pepper and simmer for at least 15 minutes.", "Boil franks.", "Serve franks on buns with onion (optional) and Cheddar cheese with chili."]

Title: Punch Bowl Cake

Title: Crock-Pot Tortilla Pie
Ingredients: ["1 to 1 1/2 lb. ground beef", "1 can green chilies", "1 can enchilada sauce", "2 (8 oz.) cans tomato sauce", "1 can whole kernel corn, drained", "2 cans chili beans", "2 c. grated cheese", "chopped onion", "1 pkg. tortilla shells"]

Title: Crab Salad

Recipe: ["Remove the crusts from the bread.", "Butter each slice and cut into small cubes.", "Chop the onion and the eggs.", "Add them to the bread cubes and refrigerate overnight.", "Add crab, shrimp and diced celery.", "Stir in mayonnaise.", "Cover and refrigerate 3 to 4 hours. If you use less bread, cut down the amount of mayonnaise."]

Title: Russian Tea

Title: Green Tomatoes Pepper Relish

Title: Cauliflower With Almonds

Title: Black Bean And Bulgur Chili

Transfer to big pot.", "Cover with 3 quarts of water.", "Bring to boil for several minutes and then soak.", "Drain, rinse and cover with water plus 1/2-inch for cooking process.", "Bring to simmer; cover pot and cook for 1 1/2 hours or until tender."]

Title: Jello Salad
Ingredients: ["1 (3 oz.) pkg. lime jello", "1 (3 oz.) pkg. lemon jello", "2 c. hot water", "1 c. mayonnaise", "1 c. evaporated milk", "1 pt. cottage cheese", "1 (No. 2) can crushed pineapple and a little juice"]

Recipe: ["Bring water to a boil with cinnamon sticks.", "Add rice.", "When done, add the milks and sugar (to taste). Stir well.", "Add vanilla and raisins. Cook to boiling point and remove from heat.", "Good luck."]

Title: Crackers With Melted Cheese
Ingredients: ["your favorite kind of crackers (soda crackers work well)", "your favorite cheese, sliced a little smaller than crackers"]
Recipe: ["Put the cheese on a plate; arrange the crackers on plate.", "Put them in microwave for 20 seconds.", "If the cheese is not melted, microwave 10 seconds more."]

Title: Apple Fritters
Ingredients: ["1 c. flour", "2 Tbsp. sugar", "1 1/2 tsp. baking powder", "1 1/4 tsp. cinnamon", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 beaten egg", "1/2 c. plus 1 Tbsp. milk", "1/2 tsp. vanilla (optional)", "1 1/2 c. diced apples (tart ones, such as Granny Smith)"]
Recipe: ["Mix together flour, sugar, baking powder, cinnamon and salt. Add egg, milk and vanilla.", "Then stir in apples.", "Drop by large tablespoon into hot oil and fry until golden brown.", "Sprinkle with powdered sugar and serve with apple butter on the side."]

Recipe: ["Dissolve Jell-O in boiling water; stir in strawberries, banana and pineapple.", "Pour 1/2 mix in mold; let congeal until firm. Spread with sour cream.", "Add remainder of mixture and congeal. Serves 6 to 8."]

Title: Bread And Butter Pickles

Recipe: ["Soak vegetables overnight in salt water (1/2 cup to 2 quarts water); drain.", "Heat to boiling the remaining ingredients.", "Add vegetables; return to boil and simmer for 10 minutes.", "Pack in sterile jars.", "Process in boiling water bath.", "Increase vinegar spice mix as needed for amount of vegetables."]

Title: Seven Layer Salad

Title: Pierogi

Recipe: ["Saute onion in butter.", "Add onion, cheese, butter, salt and pepper to mashed potatoes and mix well.", "Sift flour, salt and baking powder into a bowl.", "Add beaten eggs and milk.", "Combine well and turn out onto floured board and knead for 10 minutes. Title: Fruit Bars

Recipe: ["Place water in a saucepan.", "Sprinkle gelatin over water. Place mixture into a blender, 1/3 at a time.", "Blend until mixture has a coarse texture, but contains not large chunks.", "Add blended ingredients to gelatin in saucepan; stir well.", "Line bottom and sides of an 8-inch square pan with wax paper.", "Spray wax paper with a nonstick spray.", "Spread mixture in pan.", "Cool completely in refrigerator until firm, about 2 to 3 hours.", "Cut into 24 bars. Title: Strawberry Crunch Cake

Spread in 9 x 13 inch pan.", "Lay chicken breasts on top of rice mixture.", "Sprinkle onion soup mix on top of chicken breasts.", "Cover with foil and bake 2 hours at 350 degrees. Makes 6-8 servings."]

Ingredients: ["2 lbs. ground beef", "2 c. soft bread crumbs", "1 c. milk", "2 c. minced onion", "1 Tbsp. oleo", "1 egg; beaten", "2 Tbsp. chopped parsley", "2 tsp. salt", "1/4 tsp. ginger", "2 Tbsp. oleo"]
Recipe: ["Soak bread in milk for 5 minutes.", "Cook onion in oleo until tender. Combine meat, crumbs, egg, onion, parsley and seasoning. Beat till fluffy with mixer, about 5 minutes.", "Form into balls and brown in oleo.", "Remove meatballs."]

Title: Life'S Recipe
Ingredients: ["1 c. of God's thoughts", "1 c. of kind deeds", "1 c. of consideration for others", "2 c. of sacrifice for others", "3 c. of forgiveness for others", "2 c. of well-beaten faults"]

Title: Deviled Lamb Shanks

Recipe: ["Bring water, spices and sugar to a boil. Add juices and cider. Simmer for at least half hour. Serve warm."]

Title: Pizzelles
Ingredients: ["2 c. all-purpose flour", "1 c. sugar", "2 tsp. baking powder", "3/4 c. margarine or butter, melted and cooled", "1 Tbsp. anise extract or vanilla or lemon extract", "4 eggs, slightly beaten"]
Recipe: ["Grease pizzelle iron.", "Heat pizzelle iron according to manufacturer's directions.", "(You can also use a krumkake iron instead of pizzelle iron.)", "Mix all ingredients.", "Drop 1 tablespoon batter onto heated pizzelle iron and close iron.", "Bake about 30 seconds or until golden brown.", "Carefully remove pizzelle from iron; cool.", "Repeat with remaining batter.", "Makes about 3 1/2 dozen, 75 calories per cookie."]

Title: Icebox Fruitcake
Ingredients: ["1 qt. chopped pecans", "1 lb. candied cherries", "1 lb. dates", "1 lb. box vanilla wafers", "1/2 lb. butter", "1 qt. chopped walnuts", "2 slices green candied pineapple", "48 large marshmallows", "1 c. white raisins"]
Recipe: ["Roll box of vanilla wafers until fine crumbs.", "Cut up fruit in a large pan.", "Add crumbs and mix well.", "Melt butter and marshmallows in a double boiler.", "Pour over mixture and mix well. Then press in a well-greased pan.", "Let set in refrigerator at least 48 hours before cutting."]

Title: Old Fashioned Molasses Taffy
Ingredients: ["2 c. molasses", "1 Tbsp. butter", "1 c. sugar", "1 Tbsp. vinegar", "1/3 tsp. soda", "1/2 tsp. flavoring"]
Recipe: ["Combine molasses, butter, sugar and vinegar. Cook to light-crack stage. Remove from heat. Stir in soda and flavoring. Turn onto buttered platters and cool until you can take it up in your hands. Pull until cream colored, then twist. This is fun to pull with 2 people."]

Title: Friday Night Dip
Ingredients: ["1 lb. Velveeta cheese", "1 can Ro-Tel tomatoes with chilies", "1 can chili (optional)"]
Recipe: ["Cut cheese into chunks.", "Add tomatoes (cut up if whole). Microwave on High, stirring occasionally, until cheese is melted. Add chili and stir well.", "Great with tortilla chips."]

Title: Kraut Slaw
Ingredients: ["1 large can kraut, drained", "1 c. sugar", "1 c. chopped celery", "1 small can pimiento", "1/2 c. chopped onion", "1/3 c. vinegar", "1 small green pepper, chopped"]
Recipe: ["Mix ingredients.", "Chill; best to let set overnight.", "Can add more sugar, if you like."]

Title: Alison'S Fast, Fun And Healthy Pasta Salad
Ingredients: ["1 pkg. tricolor rotini (twists)*", "about 2 c. assorted vegetables (fresh or frozen), steamed", "1 tomato, diced**", "1 bottle fat-free salad dressing***"]
Recipe: ["How to make it:", "Prepare the pasta according to package directions; drain and let cool for a few minutes.", "Mix the pasta, vegetables and tomatoes together.", "Toss the whole thing with the fat-free dressing.", "(You can use as much or as little as you like, but make sure that you use at least enough to coat the pasta, or it will stick together in an ugly and congealed lump!)"]

Title: Marinated Carrots
Ingredients: ["2 lb. carrots", "1 small green pepper", "1 medium onion", "1 can tomato soup", "3/4 c. oil", "1 c. sugar", "3/4 c. vinegar", "1 tsp. mustard, salt and Worcestershire sauce", "1/2 tsp. pepper"]
Recipe: ["Slice and cook carrots; drain and place in layers in glass roasting pan or large Corning pan.", "Top with thinly sliced onion and green pepper.", "Repeat layering.", "Mix other ingredients; pour over carrots.", "Marinate in refrigerator overnight.", "Taste improves with age.", "Serves 8 to 10."]

Title: Chiffon Pumpkin Pie
Ingredients: ["3/4 c. brown sugar", "1 envelope unflavored gelatin", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. cinnamon", "1/2 tsp. nutmeg", "1/4 tsp. ginger", "3 slightly beaten egg yolks", "3/4 c. milk", "1 1/4 c. pumpkin", "3 egg whites", "1/3 c. sugar"]
Recipe: ["In saucepan combine brown sugar, gelatin, salt and spices. In bowl combine egg yolks and milk.", "Stir into brown sugar mix and cook stirring constantly until it comes to a boil, remove from heat, stir in pumpkin.", "Let set and chill until it mounds slightly.", "Beat egg whites until soft peaks form gradually.", "Add sugar beating at high speed until stiff peaks form.", "Then fold into pumpkin mixture thoroughly.", "Turn into baked crust.", "Chill until firm.", "Garnish with whipped cream."]

Title: Texas Corn Bread
Ingredients: ["4 eggs", "3 tsp. baking powder", "1 c. sour cream", "1 can corn", "1/2 c. oil", "1/2 c. Cheddar cheese", "3 Tbsp. sugar"]
Recipe: ["Pour into iron skillet and bake until well done."]

Title: Chocolate Hershey Dessert
Ingredients: ["9 x 13-inch graham cracker crust", "1 c. milk", "2 large almond Hershey bars", "1 (10 oz.) marshmallows"]
Recipe: ["Bake graham cracker crust 8 to 10 minutes in 9 x 13-inch cake pan."]

Title: Chocolate Peanut Clusters

Recipe: ["Mix the first 4 ingredients.", "Pour into saucepan; bring to a rolling boil, stirring often.", "Lower heat and keep stirring while mixture boils slowly for 3 minutes.", "Remove from heat.", "Stir in peanuts.", "Stir mixture until candy starts to thicken.", "Drop mixture quickly onto wax paper and cool."]

Title: Friendship Tea

Recipe: ["Mix well.", "Use 1 1/2 tablespoons of mix per cup of hot water."]

Title: Pizza Dip
Ingredients: ["1 pkg. spreadable cream cheese", "1/2 jar cocktail sauce", "1 small can tiny shrimp", "chopped green onion", "chopped bell pepper", "chopped tomato", "olives, sliced", "4 oz. Mozzarella cheese"]

Title: Cherry Cheesecake
Ingredients: ["2 pkg. (one 8 oz., one 3 oz.) cream cheese, softened", "1 c. confectioners sugar", "1 (8 oz.) carton frozen whipped topping, thawed", "1 (8 or 9-inch) graham cracker crust", "1 can cherry pie filling"]
Recipe: ["In a mixing bowl, beat the cream cheese and sugar until smooth. Fold in whipped topping; spoon into crust. Top with pie filling. Refrigerate until serving. Makes 6 to 8 servings."]

Title: Ginger Ale Salad
Ingredients: ["1 pkg. orange jello", "1 pkg. lemon jello", "2 c. boiling water", "1 (12 oz.) can ginger ale", "1 (No. 2) can crushed pineapple, drained (save juice)", "1 c. chopped pecans", "1 c. miniature marshmallows", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. flour", "1 c. pineapple juice", "1 egg, well beaten", "1 pkg. Dream Whip, prepared as directed"]
Recipe: ["Let orange jello, lemon jello, boiling water and ginger ale partly set.", "Mix in pineapple, pecans and marshmallows. Refrigerate.", "Mix sugar, flour, pineapple juice and eggs.", "Cook until thickened.", "Prepare Dream Whip as directed; then fold in pineapple mixture.", "Spread over jello salad; refrigerate until well chilled."]

Title: Broccoli And Cheese Soup
Ingredients: ["2 Tbsp. finely chopped onion", "2 Tbsp. margarine", "3 Tbsp. flour", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/8 tsp. pepper", "2 c. milk", "1 c. American cheese", "2 c. chicken bouillon cubes", "1 1/2 c. water", "1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen, chopped broccoli"]
Recipe: ["In a large pan, cook onion in butter until tender. Stir in flour, salt and pepper until well blended.", "Add milk.", "Cook until thickened, stirring constantly. Add cheese and stir until melted. Remove from heat.", "In a separate pan, dissolve bouillon in water. Bring to a boil.", "Add broccoli and cook until done.", "Do not drain. Add broccoli to mixture."]

Title: Dream Salad
Ingredients: ["1 c. pineapple juice", "1 c. crushed pineapple", "1 c. whipping cream", "1 pt. small curd cottage cheese", "1 pkg. lime jello", "1/2 c. sugar", "1/2 c. chopped nuts", "12 large marshmallows"]
Recipe: ["Bring to a boil the pineapple juice, sugar and jello.", "Do not remove from heat.", "Add 12 chopped marshmallows until melted. Remove from heat and cool.", "Add cottage cheese, crushed pineapple and nuts.", "Fold in whipped cream.", "Chill."]

Title: Peach Ice Cream
Ingredients: ["1 qt. crushed ripe peaches", "juice of 1 lemon", "2 1/2 c. sugar", "1/2 tsp. almond extract", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 pint cream", "1 pint half & half", "1 quart milk"]
Recipe: ["Combine crushed peaches, lemon juice, sugar and almond. Cover and let stand 1 hour.", "Pour mixture into a gallon ice cream freezer.", "Add remaining ingredients in order listed.", "Stir thoroughly.", "Freeze according to manufacturers instructions."]

Title: Apricot Salad
Ingredients: ["2 (3 oz.) pkg. apricot Jell-O", "1 (8 oz.) can crushed pineapple", "2 cans Seven-Up", "1/2 pt. sour cream", "1/2 c. chopped pecans"]

Title: Black-Eyed Pea Chowder

Ingredients: ["1 1/2 lb. lean ground beef", "4 cloves garlic, crushed", "1 large onion, diced", "1 medium green pepper, diced", "2 ribs celery, diced", "2 c. whole mushrooms", "1/2 c. chopped fresh parsley", "2 tsp. Recipe: ["Mix dry soup and milk in medium saucepan; heat slowly.", "When just scalded, add a small portion of cheese and stir constantly until cheese is melted.", "Continue to add cheese gradually, stirring constantly, making sure each addition is melted before adding more cheese.", "Add tuna and parsley.", "Turn into fondue saucepan and partially cover flame so mixture is kept just warm. Title: Chow Chow Relish

Title: Horseradish Sauce
