Title: Nectarine Pineapple Conserves
Ingredients: ["2 1/2 lb. fresh nectarines", "1 (8 1/4 oz.) can crushed pineapple", "1/4 c. lemon juice", "1/4 c. maraschino cherries", "7 1/2 c. sugar", "1/2 (6 oz.) bottle liquid pectin"]
Recipe: ["Pit nectarines; do not peel. Finely chop or grind, using coarse blade. (Or dice about 1/2 cup at a time in processor until they are finely crushed, not smooth.) Measure fruit; should be 3 cups. Combine with undrained pineapple, lemon juice, cherries and sugar in a large kettle. Heat to boiling, stirring until sugar dissolves. Boil hard for 1", "minute. Remove from heat and stir in pectin. Stir and skim off foam for 7 minutes. Pour into hot, sterilized glass jars and seal at once. You may pour a thin layer of melted paraffin over tops of jars. When cool, add a lid and seal it. Makes 9 jelly jars."]

Title: Granny'S Tomatoes

Title: Bacon Fettucini

Title: Chicken And Dumplings
Ingredients: ["1 stewing hen (fryer or chicken parts will work)", "2 c. plain flour", "1 tsp. salt", "1 c. cold water"]
Recipe: ["Cook stewing hen in crock pot or regular pot", "for 7 to 8 hours. Salt and pepper to taste and cover the hen with water. Cook on low heat. To make your dumplings mix flour, salt and enough cold water to make a soft dough. Cover and set in refrigerator for two hours. Take out and put on floured surface. Work more flour in to make a stiff dough. Divide into 5 parts, roll out thin and cut into strips. Place wax paper on cookie sheet and lay strips on cookie sheet side by side. Repeat layers on wax paper until all dough has been used. Cover and freeze overnight. When ready to cook dumplings remove the hen parts from the broth. Transfer broth to a large pot and bring broth to a boil. Break frozen strips of dough and drop into broth until you have enough dumplings. Turn heat down, cover and simmer for 10 minutes."]

Recipe: ["Cut up chicken and cook in water with desired seasonings until tender.", "After chicken is done, debone and set aside.", "Save 1 1/2 quarts of broth.", "Chop onions.", "Add bell peppers and saute in 1 1/2 sticks oleo until tender.", "Add Ro-Tel, english peas (drained) and mushrooms (drained).", "Cook pasta in 1 1/2 quarts of broth until tender.", "Add cheese and chopped chicken to all other ingredients.", "Place in casserole dish and cook in 350 degree oven until bubbly hot.", "This can also be placed in a crockpot and cooked on low for a couple of hours.", "Be sure to watch it, and stir frequently so that it doesn't stick to the crockpot."]

Title: Graham Cracker Torte

Recipe: ["Roll graham crackers to crumbs.", "Take out 1/2 cup and set aside.", "Put remaining crumbs in mixing bowl and add sugar, cinnamon, and melted butter.", "Mix well and line the well-buttered pans with the crumbs.", "Can be made in a 9 inch square cake pan or two pie tins."]

Title: Coconut Pie
Ingredients: ["1 c. granulated sugar", "2 Tbsp. flour or cornstarch", "1 Tbsp. oleo", "2 eggs", "2 c. milk", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 or 1 1/2 c. coconut"]
Recipe: ["Mix sugar, flour or cornstarch and eggs.", "Add milk; cook until thick.", "Add vanilla, coconut and oleo."]

Title: Corn Casserole
Ingredients: ["1 can Jiffy corn muffin mix", "2 cans (16 oz.) creamed corn", "1 c. vegetable oil", "4 eggs, beaten", "1 small jar pimento", "2 tsp. garlic salt", "1 c. grated Cheddar cheese"]
Recipe: ["Select\tnice, clean corn and cut off both ends, without exposing", "the kernels.", "Do not remove silks before microwaving as they add sweetness to the corn.", "Remove only the outer dry husks. Open", "the", "tips", "of", "corn, just enough to let the cold water trickle", "in.", "Let", "set", "about 5 minutes, then shake out excess water.", "Microwave", "on", "High,", "3 corns for about 7 to 8 minutes, or if just one corn, 3 minutes.", "Allow to set without opening the door for a few moments."]

Title: Three Bean Salad
Ingredients: ["1 can yellow wax beans", "1 can green French beans or any kind", "1 can red kidney beans", "1 c. or less diced onion", "3/4 c. sugar", "1/2 c. vinegar", "1/2 c. salad oil", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/4 tsp. pepper", "a little finely diced green pepper (optional)"]
Recipe: ["Drain water from green and yellow beans.", "Wash kidney beans. Mix sugar and vinegar until sugar dissolves, heating a little helps.", "Cool and add oil; pour over beans and mix well."]

Title: Caramel Butter Frosting
Ingredients: ["1/2 c. butter or margarine", "1 c. brown sugar", "1/4 c. milk", "3 1/4 c. confectioners sugar"]
Recipe: ["Melt butter in saucepan.", "Add brown sugar.", "Bring to a boil, stirring constantly for about 1 minute or until slightly thick. Cool slightly.", "Add milk and beat until smooth with electric mixer.", "Beat in confectioners sugar until spreading consistency. (Add more milk if too thick or more sugar if too thin.)"]

Title: Sweet And Sour Meat Balls
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 lb. ground beef", "3/4 c. bread crumbs", "1 egg, beaten", "1 small onion, grated"]
Recipe: ["Mix all ingredients together and shape into 1-inch balls."]

Title: Tangy Meatballs

Recipe: ["Combine the ground beef, egg, chili sauce, chopped onion, salt and pepper with 1 cup cheese cracker crumbs.", "Mix thoroughly. Shape into tiny meatballs and roll in the remaining 1/2 cup cracker crumbs."]

Title: Deviled Eggs

Recipe: ["Boil eggs for 10 minutes; peel.", "Cut them in half and remove yolks.", "Mix yolks with mustard and mayonnaise.", "Fill eggs with the yolk mixture and serve."]

Title: Easy Peanut Butter Cookies
Ingredients: ["1 c. super chunky peanut butter", "1 c. sugar", "1 egg", "1/2 tsp. vanilla"]

Title: Uncle Jack'S Spaghetti Sauce
Ingredients: ["1 can chopped tomatoes and green chilies", "1 can stewed tomatoes", "1 can mushroom pieces, drained", "1 tsp. garlic salt", "1 tsp. cumin (optional)", "1/2 tsp. crushed oregano", "1/4 tsp. black pepper"]
Recipe: ["Blend ingredients in blender; don't whip.", "Pour over 1 pound extra lean, browned ground beef.", "Simmer on low for 10 minutes. Serve over drained spaghetti.", "Can be used over fried zucchini or squash and chopped onion, covered with cheese and baked."]

Title: Old Berliner Frankfurter Skillet
Ingredients: ["4 slices bacon, chopped", "1 small onion, minced", "1 c. chicken broth", "1/2 c. cider vinegar", "2 Tbsp. brown sugar", "1 tsp. pickling spice", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/4 tsp. pepper", "8 c. shredded red or green cabbage", "1 lb. frankfurters"]
Recipe: ["In a large skillet, fry bacon five minutes.", "Add onion and cook until it is tender.", "Add broth , vinegar, sugar, pickling spice, salt and pepper.", "Bring to a simmer, add cabbage, cover and simmer 45 minutes, stirring occasionally.", "Slash franks crosswise six or seven times, about 1/4 inch deep.", "Place them over cooked cabbage.", "Cover and cook for 15 minutes more."]

Title: Confederate Sweet Potatoes

Title: Juju'S Frozen Dessert

Recipe: ["Mix well all ingredients in a large bowl. Pour into a 9 x 13 casserole dish. Cover with Reynolds Wrap. Put into freezer for at least 2 hours. When ready to serve, take out of freezer, allowing to thaw slightly. Enjoy a cool treat."]

Title: Chocolate Covered Peanut Balls
Ingredients: ["1 c. peanut butter", "2 sticks oleo", "1 c. coconut", "1 (4 oz.) stick paraffin wax", "1 (1 lb.) box powdered sugar", "2 c. graham cracker crumbs", "1 c. chopped nuts", "1 (6 oz.) pkg. chocolate chips"]
Recipe: ["Melt butter.", "Add peanut butter and powdered sugar; mix well. Add cracker crumbs, coconut and nuts.", "Roll in small balls. Refrigerate 5 to 6 hours or overnight.", "When well chilled, melt the chocolate pieces and paraffin wax together in a double boiler. Dip peanut balls in hot, melted chocolate, using toothpicks to dip with.", "Refrigerate."]

Title: Grandma'S Sugar Cookies

Recipe: ["Mix flour, salt, butter and Crisco as if for pie crust.", "In another bowl, mix sugar, eggs, lemon juice, vanilla, baking powder and cream of tartar; mix well.", "Combine the two mixtures until smooth.", "Chill in fridge at least one hour."]

Title: Red Cinnamon Jelly

Title: Cheese Log

Title: Crisfield Crab-Burgers

Title: Kaju Murgh Kari-Curried Chicken With Cashews(Origin:  India And Pakistan)
Ingredients: ["1 chicken (about 1.75 kg; 3 1/2 lb.)", "3 Tbsp. ghee or oil", "2 large onions, finely chopped", "3 cloves garlic, finely chopped", "1 1/2 tsp. finely grated fresh ginger", "3 Tbsp. curry powder", "1 tsp. chili powder (optional)", "3 tsp. salt", "3 ripe tomatoes, peeled and chopped", "2 Tbsp. chopped fresh coriander or mint leaves", "2 tsp. garam masala", "1/2 c. yogurt", "125 g (4 oz.) raw cashews, finely ground"]

Recipe: ["In a large skillet, combine drippings or oil, brown sugar, vinegar, water, salt and pepper.", "Cook for 2-3 minutes or until hot, stirring occasionally.", "Add cabbage; cover and cook for 10 minutes over medium-low heat, stirring occasionally.", "Add apples and cook uncovered for about 10 minutes more or until tender. Yield 6-8 servings.", "If cooking for two:", "Cabbage keeps well when frozen in airtight containers."]

Title: Sweet Pickles(One Quart, Microwave)

Title: Chicken Pie

Title: Old Fashioned Prune Butter(Low-Fat)

Recipe: ["Combine sugar, flour, shortening and milk in saucepan and heat until boiling.", "Cool slightly and stir in vanilla.", "Pour mixture slowly over stiffly beaten egg whites, beating until well blended. Especially good with chocolate cake."]

Title: K'S Dream Cake
Ingredients: ["1 pkg. yellow cake mix", "2 (16 oz.) cans crushed pineapple", "2 small or 1 large pkg. vanilla pudding mix (instant)", "1 large Cool Whip (12 oz.)"]
Recipe: ["Prepare cake according to package directions.", "Bake in a greased and floured 9 x 13-inch pan.", "When cake is baked, poke holes in cake surface with a fork.", "Spread pineapple and juice over cake while hot.", "Let cool.", "Prepare pudding according to package instructions.", "Spread pudding over cake.", "Cool in refrigerator for 1/2 hour.", "Spread Cool Whip over cake.", "Serves 12."]

Title: Hearty Vegetable Chicken Soup
Ingredients: ["2 Tbsp. margarine", "1/4 c. green pepper, diced", "1 (16 oz.) can Veg-All mixed vegetables", "1 Tbsp. parsley flakes", "3 c. cooked chicken, diced", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/4 c. chopped onion", "3 c. chicken stock", "3 1/2 c. canned tomatoes", "2 bay leaves, each broken into 2 pieces", "1/8 tsp. black pepper"]
Recipe: ["First Layer:", "1 medium or large head of lettuce"]

Title: Ultimate Chicken Strips
Ingredients: ["3/4 c. buttermilk", "1/2 tsp. oregano", "1 1/4 c. flour", "oil (for frying)", "1 Tbsp. instant chicken bouillon", "1 lb. boneless chicken strips", "2 tsp. paprika"]
Recipe: ["In a bowl, combine buttermilk, bouillon and oregano. Let stand 1 minute. Stir in chicken and let stand 30 minutes. In plastic bag, combine flour and paprika. Add chicken, a few pieces at a time. Coat, then dip in buttermilk mixture, then with flour again. Fry until golden brown on both sides. Serve with Peach Sauce."]

Title: Chicken Spaghetti
Ingredients: ["2 Tbsp. oleo", "1/2 c. milk", "8 oz. jar Cheez Whiz", "1 can cream of mushroom soup", "1/2 lb. spaghetti", "2 boneless chicken breasts, boiled and cubed", "1 pkg. frozen chopped broccoli, cooked and drained"]
Recipe: ["To Prepare:", "Boil spaghetti.", "Drain and add oleo, broccoli and chicken. Mix milk, soup and cheese.", "Mix together with spaghetti. Serve hot."]

Title: Chocolate Coconut Balls
Ingredients: ["1/2 sick margarine, melted", "1 box powdered sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "2 pkg. Nestle chocolate chips", "1 can sweetened condensed milk", "1 (14 oz.) pkg. coconut", "1 c. nuts, chopped fine", "1/4 bar Gulf wax"]
Recipe: ["Mix all ingredients and chill.", "Roll into small balls, then dip into chocolate and wax which has been melted together.", "Place on wax paper to dry.", "Store in an airtight container."]

Title: Jello Shake
Ingredients: ["vanilla ice cream", "milk", "1 small box any flavor Jell-O gelatin dessert", "vanilla flavoring"]
Recipe: ["Scoop ice cream into blender. Add enough milk to cover ice cream. Pour in 1/2 package of Jell-O. Add a few drops of vanilla flavoring. Blend until smooth and creamy. Pour into frozen mugs and Enjoy!"]

Title: Pasta Primavera
Ingredients: ["1 lb. smoked sausage", "2 c. fresh broccoli flowerets", "1 med. onion, chopped", "1 large clove garlic, chopped", "1 Tbsp. olive oil", "1 large carrot, scraped and sliced diagonally", "1 medium red bell pepper, chopped", "1 medium yellow bell pepper, chopped", "1 c. whipping cream", "1/2 c. chicken broth", "3 green onions, chopped", "2 tsp. basil", "1/2 tsp. salt", "8 oz. uncooked linguine", "1/2 lb. fresh mushrooms, sliced", "1 c. freshly grated parmesan cheese", "1/4 tsp. pepper"]
Recipe: ["Cut smoked sausage into 1/2 to 3/4 inch circles.", "Place broccoli flowerets and sausage into a vegetable steamer over boiling water, cover and steam 6 to 8 minutes (until crisp and tender).", "Remove from heat and set aside.", "Saute onions (not the green onions), mushrooms and bell peppers.\tAdd the carrot to onion mixture, cover, drain and set aside.", "Combine whipping cream, broth, sliced green onions, basil and salt in a medium skillet. Cook over medium heat 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.", "Let thicken.", "Cook linguine according to package directions - drain and place in a large bowl.", "Add reserved vegetables, whipping cream mixture and sliced mushrooms.", "Toss gently.", "Sprinkle with parmesan cheese and pepper.\tToss and serve immediately.", "Serves 8."]

Title: Popikosh(Beef Paprika)
Ingredients: ["1/4 c. oil", "2 lb. beef chuck or round, cut in 1-inch cubes", "1 c. diced onion", "1 clove garlic, minced", "3/4 c. catsup", "2 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce", "1 Tbsp. brown sugar", "1 tsp. salt or as desired", "2 tsp. paprika", "1/2 tsp. dry mustard", "dash of cayenne pepper", "1 1/2 c. water", "2 Tbsp. flour", "1/4 c. water", "3 c. hot cooked noodles"]
Recipe: ["Heat oil in large skillet.", "Add meat, onion and garlic.", "Cook and stir until meat is brown and onion is tender.", "Stir in catsup, Worcestershire sauce, sugar, salt, paprika, mustard, cayenne and 1 1/2 cups water.", "Cover and simmer 2 to 2 1/2 hours, adding more water as needed.", "Blend flour and 1/4 cup water.", "Stir into meat mixture.", "Cook and stir 1 minute.", "Serve over noodles."]

Title: Chocolate Drink Mix
Ingredients: ["1 (16 oz.) box instant chocolate powder", "1 (8 qt.) box powdered milk", "1 (6 oz.) jar powdered cream", "1/2 c. powdered sugar"]
Recipe: ["Combine all ingredients and mix well.", "Store in airtight container.", "To serve:", "Use 1/3 cup mix to 1 cup hot water."]

Title: Coquilles St. Jacques
Ingredients: ["1 lb. scallops", "2 Tbsp. minced onion", "1 Tbsp. butter or margarine", "1 Tbsp. lemon juice", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1/8 tsp. marjoram leaves", "dash of paprika", "3/4 c. dry white wine", "1/4 lb. mushrooms, washed, trimmed and coarsely chopped (about 1 1/2 c.)", "1/3 c. butter or margarine", "1/4 c. all-purpose flour", "1 c. whipping cream", "2 tsp. snipped parsley", "1 Tbsp. butter or margarine", "1/3 c. dry bread crumbs"]
Recipe: ["If the large sea scallops are used, cut each into 3 or 4 pieces.", "Wash scallops; remove any shell particles and drain."]

Title: Bullseye(A Fun Way To Serve Children Eggs)
Ingredients: ["1 egg (per serving)", "butter", "1 slice white or rye bread (per serving)"]
Recipe: ["First prepare the bread by cutting a hole in the middle of the slice.", "Use a water glass or child's plastic cup."]

Title: Pepper Steak(Slow Cooker)
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 to 2 lb. round steak (1/2 inch thick)", "1/4 c. flour", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/8 tsp. pepper", "1 medium onion", "1 small garlic clove", "1 large green pepper", "1 (16 oz.) can whole tomatoes", "1 Tbsp. beef flavor base (paste or granular)", "1 Tbsp. soy sauce", "2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce", "rice"]
Recipe: ["Cut round steak into strips.", "Combine flour, salt and pepper. Toss with steak strips to coat thoroughly.", "Add to electric pot along with onions (minced), garlic clove and green pepper (cut in 1/2-inch strips)."]

Title: Wassail
Ingredients: ["2 large cans apple juice", "1 large can cranberry juice", "1 large can pineapple juice", "1/2 c. sugar", "6 cinnamon sticks"]
Recipe: ["Simmer 15 minutes.", "A crock-pot is handy for keeping it hot."]

Title: Apple Waldorf Salad
Ingredients: ["6 to 8 red apples", "6 to 8 green apples", "1 large can pineapple chunks", "1 stalk celery, diced", "1 c. mayonnaise", "1 or 2 c. Dream Whip"]
Recipe: ["Mix together.", "Cool and serve.", "Yields 4 to 6 servings."]

Title: Chicken And Noodles
Ingredients: ["1 whole chicken fryer, cut up or favorite part of chicken", "1 can undiluted cream of celery chicken or mushroom soup", "4 c. water", "3/4 tsp. salt", "1/2 tsp. pepper", "1 to 2 stalks celery", "1 to 2 carrots", "parsley flakes", "1/2 to 1 bag wide egg noodles", "1/4 to 1/2 white onion"]
Recipe: ["Put chicken on to boil with salt, pepper, celery, carrots, onions and parsley flakes.", "Boil all of the ingredients for 1 hour or until tender.", "(Boil the ingredients in 4 cups water.)", "Remove the chicken and add 1 can undiluted soup.", "After soup comes to a boil, add noodles and chicken; let cook for 12 minutes."]

Title: Taco Dip
Ingredients: ["16 oz. sour cream", "8 oz. Philly cream cheese", "1 pkg. taco seasoning", "lettuce", "12 oz. cheese", "tomato", "black olives"]
Recipe: ["Blend the sour cream, cream cheese and taco seasoning together until smooth.", "Spread mixture in pan.", "Top with toppings."]

Title: Carolina Delights
Ingredients: ["2 c sugar", "3 tbsp cocoa", "1/2 c milk", "1 stick butter", "1/2 c peanut butter", "1 tsp vanilla", "3 c instant oatmeal"]
Recipe: ["Mix together sugar, cocoa and milk and boil for one minute. Remove from heat.", "Add peanut butter, vanilla, and oatmeal. Stir. Drop onto wax paper.", "Let cool."]

Title: Apple Oatmeal Breakfast
Ingredients: ["2/3 c. uncooked oats (regular or quick)", "1 medium apple, cored and finely chopped", "2 Tbsp. chopped walnuts", "1 Tbsp. brown sugar", "dash of cinnamon"]
Recipe: ["Cook oats according to package. Stir in apples, nuts, brown sugar and cinnamon. Let stand, covered, for 3 minutes."]

Title: Rice Balls(Makes 3 Dozen)
Ingredients: ["3 c. short grain rice", "7 c. salted water", "1 stick margarine", "1/4 c. cooking oil", "1 c. chopped celery", "1 1/2 lb. lean ground meat", "3/4 c. chopped green onions", "2 Tbsp. chili powder", "1 (6 oz.) can tomato sauce", "1/2 c. water", "1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese", "1 Tbsp. chopped parsley", "3 whole eggs, beaten", "5 c. seasoned bread crumbs", "oil (for deep frying)"]
Recipe: ["Add rice to salted", "water;", "bring", "to", "a", "boil.", "Simmer until rice is mushy.", "Remove", "from heat; add margarine.", "Cool. Fry meat in 1/4 cup", "oil until meat loses redness.", "Add onions and celery and cook", "slowly for 10 minutes.", "Add chili powder, tomato sauce and water.", "Simmer 1 hour, stirring occasionally. Remove from heat.", "Add", "parsley, cheese and salt and pepper to taste.", "Set aside to cool."]

Title: Simple Greek Shrimp
Ingredients: ["1/4 c. butter or margarine", "1 large green bell pepper, seeded and chopped", "1 large onion, chopped", "1 (20 oz.) can stewed tomatoes", "2 c. clam broth", "1/2 c. dry white wine", "1 c. white or brown rice (raw)", "1 lb. medium size shrimp, cooked until pink", "2 (6 1/2 oz.) cans minced clams, drained (optional)", "1 c. Feta cheese, crumbled"]
Recipe: ["In an electric skillet, melt the butter over low heat.", "Add the green pepper and onion; saute until crisp-tender (about five minutes).", "Add the tomatoes and clam broth, the wine and rice. Increase the heat to medium-high and boil for 25 to 30 minutes. Add the shrimp and clams; reduce the heat to medium.", "Simmer for three minutes.", "Transfer to a serving dish; sprinkle with the Feta cheese.", "Enjoy!"]

Title: Cold Eggplant Appetizers(Microwave)
Ingredients: ["1 eggplant", "1 small onion", "1/2 medium green pepper, minced", "1 clove garlic, minced", "1 tsp. lemon juice", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/8 tsp. pepper", "1 c. plain yogurt"]
Recipe: ["Place whole eggplant on microproof baking rack.", "Pierce skin in several places.", "Cook on High (maximum power) 6 to 7 minutes or until soft.", "Set aside to cool.", "Combine onion, green pepper, garlic and lemon juice in small microproof bowl.", "Cook on High (maximum power) 1 1/2 to 2 minutes or until vegetables are limp. Cut eggplant in half; scoop pulp into small mixing bowl.", "Add all ingredients except yogurt.", "Beat until well blended.", "Stir in yogurt, cover and chill thoroughly.", "Makes 2 cups."]

Title: Mrs. Betty'S Tuna
Ingredients: ["1 can tuna fish (family size)", "1 can cream of mushroom soup", "1 can (small) green peas", "1 can (small) pimentos", "3 tsp. Worcestershire"]
Recipe: ["Mix all these items together and simmer a few minutes.", "Don't let it stick.", "Serve on biscuits or toast.", "Serves about 4 people."]

Title: Chinese Fried Rice With Shrimp And Egg
Ingredients: ["1/2 c. salad oil", "1 envelope Lipton chicken noodle soup mix", "1/2 lb. fresh shrimp, shelled clean and cut up", "1/4 tsp. salt", "few grains pepper", "2 small scallions, sliced", "1 c. raw regular or processed white rice", "2 1/2 c. boiled water", "2 eggs, slightly beaten", "1 1/2 c. soy sauce"]
Recipe: ["In a large skillet, heat 2 tablespoons salad oil and saute rice until golden brown.", "Combine soup mix and water and stir into rice.", "Cover and simmer 30 minutes or until liquid is absorbed. In another skillet heat remaining oil and saute shrimp quickly for about 1 minute.", "Add eggs, stirring constantly, and cook 1 to 2 minutes.", "Add salt, pepper and soy sauce.", "Stir shrimp and egg mixture into soup-rice mixture, heat 2 to 3 minutes.", "Serve topped with scallions.", "Makes 4 to 6 servings."]

Title: Braised Pork
Ingredients: ["2 lb. lean boneless pork", "1 Tbsp. salt", "1/3 c. soy sauce", "6 garlic cloves, minced", "2 Tbsp. white vinegar", "1 Tbsp. black pepper", "1 bay leaf", "1 tsp. m.s.g.", "2 1/2 c. water"]
Recipe: ["Cut pork about 1 1/2-inch cube size.", "Wash and dry pork. Place meat in a covered stock-pot.", "Add all ingredients except water.", "Stir and add water.", "Stir.", "Cook on medium heat, stirring occasionally, 45 minutes to 1 hour and liquid reduced to approximately 1 cup.", "Serve over rice."]

Title: Pasta Salad
Ingredients: ["8 oz. uncooked spaghetti or spiral shape noodles", "1/2 c. mayonnaise", "1/2 c. Italian salad dressing", "1/4 tsp. dill weed", "1 c. frozen green peas", "1 c. sliced carrots", "1 yellow bell pepper", "1/2 small purple onion, thinly sliced", "1 can sliced black olives, drained", "1/2 c. freshly grated Parmesan cheese"]
Recipe: ["Cook pasta according to directions. Drain and rinse with cold water. Mix together mayonnaise, salad dressing and dill weed with a whisk. Add pasta and vegetables. Chill."]

Title: Cheese N' Vegetable Chowder
Ingredients: ["3 Tbsp. butter", "1 1/2 c. chopped celery", "1 c. shredded carrots", "1/4 c. sliced green onion", "2 (10 3/4 oz.) cans cream of potato soup", "1 (14 1/2 oz.) can chicken broth", "1/2 c. water", "few drops bottled hot pepper sauce", "2 c. shredded Cheddar or Colby cheese", "1 (13 oz.) can (1 2/3 c.) evaporated milk", "3 Tbsp. dry sherry", "2 Tbsp. snipped parsley"]
Recipe: ["In a large saucepan, melt butter.", "Cook celery, carrots and green onion in butter.", "Add potato soup, chicken broth, water, parsley and hot pepper sauce.", "Cook and stir until boiling; reduce heat.", "Cover and simmer for 20 to 25 minutes, stirring occasionally.", "Stir in shredded cheese, evaporated milk and sherry. Heat through (do not boil).", "Sprinkle with additional sliced green onion."]
